ACT Standard Grid
-----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5824'

Origin at AGD66 coordinates of Mt. Stromlo triangulation station. Scale factor includes reduction to average height of area covered.

AGD66 to GDA2020 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9185'

This transformation is for users wanting to apply a 7-parameter conformal transformation from AGD66 to GDA2020 in the ACT.

AGD66 to GDA94 (1)
------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory; New South Wales; Northern Territory; Queensland; South Australia; Tasmania; Western Australia; Victoria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1278'

Given to greater precision but no better accuracy at http://www.dehaa.sa.gov.au For higher accuracy requirements see various regional transformations. May be taken as approximate transformation AGD66 to WGS 84 - see code 15788. Derived at 162 stations.

AGD66 to GDA94 (11)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory; New South Wales; Northern Territory; Queensland; South Australia; Tasmania; Western Australia; Victoria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1803'

Replaces AGD66 to GDA94 variants 6, 7 and 10 (codes 1506 1507 1596). Input expects longitudes to be positive west; source and target CRSs AGD66 (code 4202) and GDA94 (code 4283) both have longitudes positive east.

AGD66 to GDA94 (12)
-------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - offshore including EEZ.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15979'

Use only offshore: onshore, transformations 1458 (ACT), 1594 (Tas), 1460 (NSW and Vic) and 1595 (NT) are more accurate.

AGD66 to GDA94 (19)
-------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5827'

Replaces nationally-derived transformation code 1458.

AGD66 to GDA94 (4)
------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - New South Wales and Victoria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1460'

For higher accuracy requirements see AGD66 to GDA94 (11) (code 1803). May be taken as approximate transformation AGD66 to WGS 84 - see code 1666.

AGD66 to GDA94 (8)
------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - Tasmania including islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1594'

Replaces AGD66 to GDA94 (3) (code 1459) from August 2000. For higher accuracy requirements see AGD66 to GDA94 (11) (code 1803). May be taken as approximate transformation AGD66 to WGS 84 - see code 1667.

AGD66 to GDA94 (9)
------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - Northern Territory.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1595'

For higher accuracy requirements see AGD66 to GDA94 (11) (code 1803). May be taken as approximate transformation AGD66 to WGS 84 - see code 1668.

AGD66 to PNG94 (2)
------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Papua New Guinea - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6937'

Derived in 2014 at 38 stations around the PNG mainland. Aligned to the Bevan Rapids Geodetic Origin AA 070 as required by the Papua New Guinea Oil and Gas Act 1998.

AGD66 to PNG94 (4)
------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Papua New Guinea - Papuan fold and thrust belt.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6939'

Derived in 2014 at 23 stations around the Kutubu oilfields. Aligned to the Bevan Rapids Geodetic Origin AA 070 as required by the Papua New Guinea Oil and Gas Act 1998. Replaces AGD66 to PNG94 (1) (tfm code 5662).

AGD66 to PNG94 (6)
------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Papua New Guinea - North Fly area (between 5°04'S and 6°36'S and west of 141°32'E).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6941'

Derived in 2014 at 7 stations in Ningerum and Tabubil (North Fly District).

AGD66 to WGS 84 (19)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Papua New Guinea - Papuan fold and thrust belt.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5841'

Derived at 25 stations in 2007. Accuracy 2m in 2007. Due to significant tectonic activity in PNG, AGD66 and WGS 84 are separating by approximately 7cm per year.

AGD66 to WGS 84 (20)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory; New South Wales; Northern Territory; Queensland; South Australia; Tasmania; Western Australia; Victoria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6905'

Derived at 161 stations. Accuracy 5m in each axis. Replaces AGD66 to WGS 84 (1) (code 1108).

AGD84 to GDA94 (2)
------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia - Queensland, South Australia, Western Australia, federal areas offshore west of 129°E.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1280'

Replaces AGD84 to WGS 84 (2) (code 1236). May be taken as approximate transformation AGD84 to WGS 84 - see code 1669. Note: although applicable nationwide, AGD84 officially adopted only in Queensland, South Australia and Western Australia.

AGD84 to GDA94 (5)
------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Australia - Queensland, South Australia, Western Australia, federal areas offshore west of 129°E.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1804'

Replaces AGD84 to GDA94 (4) (code 1593) which itself replaced variant 3 (code 1559). Input expects longitudes to be + west; EPSG GeogCRS AGD84 (code 4203) and GDA94 (code 4283) both have longitudes positive east. May be used as tfm to WGS 84 - see 15785

AIOC95 depth to Caspian depth (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: Azerbaijan - Caspian offshore and onshore Sangachal terminal.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5403'

The AIOC95 vertical reference surface is 1.7m above the Caspian vertical reference surface.

ATRF2014 to GDA2020 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9459'

Describes movement of ATRF2014 relative to GDA2020 due to Australian tectonic plate motion. Derived at 109 stations of the Australian Regional GNSS network (ARGN). Scale difference (dS) in ppb and dS rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

ATRF2014 to GDA94 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9684'

Concatenation of ATRF2014 to GDA2020 (1) (CT 9459) and GDA94 to GDA2020 (1) (CT 8048). Scale difference in ppb and rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. See ATRF2014 to GDA94 (2) (CT 9685) for alternative for Australia with distortion modelling.

ATS77 to NAD83 (1)
------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Nova Scotia onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9105'


ATS77 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (1)
--------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - New Brunswick.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9237'

Introduced in 1999. Can be taken as an approximate transformation ATS77 to WGS 84 - see code 1688.

ATS77 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (2)
--------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Prince Edward Island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9236'

Can be taken as an approximate transformation ATS77 to WGS 84 - see code 1689.

ATS77 to NAD83(CSRS)v6 (4)
--------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Nova Scotia onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9106'

Derived through NAD83(CSRS)v6. Replaces ATS77 to NAD83(CSRS)v3 (3) (transformation code 9235).

ATS77 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - New Brunswick.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1688'

Parameter file is from ATS77 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (1) (code 9237) assuming that NAD83(CSRS)v2 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

ATS77 to WGS 84 (2)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Prince Edward Island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1689'

Parameter file is from ATS77 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (2) (code 9236) assuming that NAD83(CSRS)v2 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

AbInvA96_2020-TM
----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the A96 highway from Aberdeen to Inverness.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9385'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to AbInvA96_2020-IRF (1) (code 9386), emulates the AbInvA96_2020 Snake projection.

Abidjan 1987 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Côte d'Ivoire (Ivory Coast) - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1470'

Derived in Abidjan for use in the immediate area, but used by E&P industry onshore and offshore. Accuracy is submetre in Abidjan but unknown elsewhere. A similar CT (tfm code 6872) was used by Western Geophysical for offshore surveys in the 1990s.

Adindan to WGS 84 (2)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Burkina Faso.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1101'

Derived at 1 station connected to the Adindan (Blue Nile 1958) network through the 1968-69 12th parallel traverse. Accuracy 25m in each axis. Note: the Adindan (Blue Nile 1958) CRS is used in Ethiopia and Sudan, not Burkino Faso.

Albania LCC 2010
----------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Albania - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

Albania TM 2010 projection (code 6869) used for applications at scales larger than 1:500,000.

Albania TM 2010
---------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Albania - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6869'

Planimetric component of Albanian Geodetic Reference Framework (KRGJSH) 2010. Albania LCC 2010 projection (code 6961) used for mapping at scales of 1:500,000 and smaller.

Albanian 1987 to ETRS89 (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Albania - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7833'

Derived using 90 stations by IGM Italy on behalf of ASIG. mse = 18cm.  Use only for horizontal coordinates; geoid heights must be calculated with ALBGEO3 software. May be taken as approximate transformation from Albanian 1987 to WGS 84 (see code 7834).

American Samoa 1962 to NAD83(HARN) (3)
--------------------------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (2D)
| Extent: American Samoa - Tutuila, Aunu'u, Ofu, Olesega and Ta'u islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8662'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; EPSG source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°.

American Samoa 1962 to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: American Samoa - Tutuila, Aunu'u, Ofu, Olesega and Ta'u islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1577'

Transformation based on observations at 2 stations in 1993. One sigma uncertainty is 25m in each axis.

American Samoa Lambert
----------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: American Samoa - Tutuila, Aunu'u, Ofu, Olesega and Ta'u islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15376'

Per Snyder: Map Projections - a Working Manual: At origin x=500000 ft; y=0 but radius to latitude of origin = -82000000 feet. US National Geodetic Survey confirms value for False Northing.

Amersfoort to ETRS89 (8)
------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Netherlands - onshore, including Waddenzee, Dutch Wadden Islands and 12-mile offshore coastal zone.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9281'

Replaces Amersfoort to ETRS89 (5) and (6) (tfm codes 4830 and 4831). Derived using ETRF2000. In official transformation used with an ellipsoidal height of 0m in Amersfoort or 43m in ETRS89 and with an additional correction grid (up to 0.25m).

Amersfoort to ETRS89 (9)
------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Netherlands - onshore, including Waddenzee, Dutch Wadden Islands and 12-mile offshore coastal zone.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9282'

Replaces Amersfoort to ETRS89 (7) (tfm code 7000). Horizontal component of official transformation RDNAPTRANS(TM)2018.

Arc 1950 to WGS 84 (11)
-----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Malawi.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6904'

Derived at 7 stations. Accuracy 13m, 25m and 7m in X, Y and Z axes. Info source gives source CRS as Arc 1960. From inspection of parameter values, comparison with other CTs and geographic applicability of CRS, OGP believes that this should be Arc 1950.

----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Eswatini (Swaziland).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1118'

Derived at 4 stations. Accuracy 15m in each axis.

Arc 1960 to WGS 84 (4)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Burundi.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::3998'

Derived at 3 stations. Accuracy 20m in each axis. Info source gives source CRS as Arc 1950. From inspection of parameter values,  analysis of TR8350.2 contour chart sand geographic applicability of CRS, OGP believes that the this shuld be Arc 1960.

Astro DOS 71 to SHGD2015 (2)
----------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha - St Helena Island - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7895'

Derived at 19 stations, RMS = 6cm. Note: Because of the large rotations about the Y- and Z-axes this transformation is not reversible. For the reverse transformation use SHGD2015 to Astro DOS 71 (2) (code 9226).

Astro DOS 71 to WGS 84 (2)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha - St Helena Island - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7894'

Parameter values from Astro DOS 71 to SHGD2015 (1) (tfm code 7893). Assumes SHGD2015 and WGS 84 can be considered the same to within the accuracy of the transformation.

Austria Central
---------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Austria between 11°50'E and 14°50'E of Greenwich (29°30'E and 32°30'E of Ferro).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9269'

Greenwich equivalent of Austria Central Zone (EPSG code 18042).

Austria Central Zone
--------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Austria between 11°50'E and 14°50'E of Greenwich (29°30'E and 32°30'E of Ferro).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18042'

Longitude is referenced to the Ferro meridian. See code 9269 for equivalent referenced to Greenwich meridian. Replaced by Austria zone M31 (EPSG code 18048) for large and medium scale topographic mapping and engineering survey.

Austria zone M28
----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Austria west of 11°50'E of Greenwich (29°30'E of Ferro).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18047'

Longitude is referenced to the Ferro meridian. See code 18044 for equivalent referenced to Greenwich meridian. Replaces Austria West Zone (EPSG code 18041) for large and medium scale topographic mapping and engineering survey but not cadastral survey.

Austria zone M31
----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Austria between 11°50'E and 14°50'E of Greenwich (29°30'E and 32°30'E of Ferro).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18048'

Longitude is referenced to the Ferro meridian. See code 18045 for equivalent referenced to Greenwich meridian. Replaces Austria Central Zone (EPSG code 18042) for large and medium scale topographic mapping and engineering survey but not cadastral survey.

Azores Central 1995 to PTRA08 (2)
---------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - central Azores - Faial island onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5028'

BD72 to ETRS89 (2)
------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15928'

May be taken as approximate transformation BD72 to WGS 84 - see code 15929. Scale difference is given by information source as -1.0000012747. Given in this record in ppm to assist application usage.

BD72 to ETRS89 (3)
------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8369'

File name is lower case and despite its name is between geographic CRSs. (Similarly-named file in upper case BD72LB72_ETRS89LB08 operates in projected CRS domain).

------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1610'

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8889'

BGS2005 is a national realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation BGS2005 to WGS 84 - see code 8890.

BLM zone 10N (US survey feet)
-----------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United States (USA) - between 126°W and 120°W onshore and offshore - California; Oregon; Washington.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::4110'

US survey foot form of UTM zone 10N. Sometimes locally referred to as "UTM zone 10".

Baltic 1957 height to EVRF2019 height (1)
-----------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Czechia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9745'

Determined at 242 points. RMS residual 0.012m, maximum residual 0.029m. Approximates the official transformation available through the CUZK transformation service at https://geoportal.cuzk.cz/ for comparison with transformation to EVRF2007 (CT 5202).

Batavia (Jakarta) to Batavia (1)
--------------------------------
| Method: Longitude rotation
| Extent: Indonesia - onshore - Bali, Java and western Sumatra.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1759'


Batavia to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Indonesia - onshore - Bali, Java and western Sumatra.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8452'

Derived at 5 stations. Note: U.S. DMA TR8350.2 September 1987 gives source CRS as Batavia and area as Sumatra. The Batavia (Genuk) CRS applies to Java and western Sumatra. EPSG presumes this CT applies to both. Sometimes found applied to all Sumatra.

Beijing 1954 to WGS 84 (2)
--------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - offshore - Huang Hai (Yellow Sea).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15919'

Derived via WGS 72BE. Original transformation derived in 1979 at 4 stations on Yellow Sea coast.

Beijing 1954 to WGS 84 (3)
--------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - offshore South China Sea - Pearl River basin.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15920'

Derived via WGS 72BE. Original transformation derived by GSI in 1980-81. The GSI memo incorrectly gave the parameters as from WGS 72 to Beijing 1954, but it has been determined by the OGP that the memo should have stated from Beijing 1954 to WGS 72BE.

Beijing 1954 to WGS 84 (4)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - south and west Tarim basin.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15921'

Provided by BGP to ELF in 1994.

Beijing 1954 to WGS 84 (5)
--------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - offshore - Bei Bu Wan (Gulf of Tonkin).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15935'

Concatenated via WGS 72BE. Recomputation by Shelltech in 1981 of SSB 1980 observation.

Belge Lambert 50
----------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19901'

Longitude is referenced to the Brussels meridian. If software cannot handle latitude of false origin of 90°N, use latitude of false origin = 50°30'00.0"N with northing at false origin = 131983.890 m.

Belge Lambert 72
----------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP Belgium)
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19902'

Rotation from Belge Lambert 50 to Belge Lambert 72 is +29.2985sec. An equivalent using the conventional Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP) method (Belgian Lambert 72, code 19961) was introduced in 2000.

Belgian Lambert 2005
--------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19862'

Introduced in 2005.

Belgian Lambert 2008
--------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::3811'

Replaces Lambert 2005.

Belgian Lambert 72
------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19961'

Introduced in 2000. Equivalent to Belge Lambert 72 (code 19902). 

If software cannot handle latitude of false origin of 90°N, use latitude of false origin = 50°47'57.704"N with northing at false origin = 165 372.956 m.

--------------------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (CF geog2D domain)
| Extent: Colombia - region VIII (south east). South and east of a line from the intersection of the meridian of 74°W with the southern border, northwards to 3°N, 74°W, westwards to 3°'N, 74°24'W, northwards to 5°N, 74°24'W, eastwards to 5°N, 72°W, and then northwards to the intersection of the meridian of 72°W with the international border.

Borneo RSO
----------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A)
| Extent: Brunei - onshore and offshore; Malaysia - East Malaysia (Sabah; Sarawak) - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19894'

Replaces RSO Borneo (proj codes 19956-58) for use with ITRF-based geodetic CRSs. If using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B) method (code 9815), Ec=590521.147 m, Nc=442890.861 m.

British National Grid
---------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - offshore to boundary of UKCS within 49°45'N to 61°N and 9°W to 2°E; onshore Great Britain (England, Wales and Scotland). Isle of Man onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19916'

With the introduction of OSTN15, the area for the British National Grid has effectively been extended from Britain to cover the adjacent UK Continental Shelf.

CGRS93 to ETRS89 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Cyprus - onshore.

CGVD28 height to CGVD2013a(1997) height (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset by Grid Interpolation (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::10113'

Equivalent to HT2_1997 hybrid geoid model minus CGG2013a geoid model (i.e. CT code 9983 minus CT 10111 = CT 9984 minus CT 10112). Specifies NAD83(CSRS)v3 as interpolation CRS, but NAD83(CSRS)v2 (code 8237) may equally be used.

CGVD28 height to CGVD2013a(2002) height (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset by Grid Interpolation (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::10114'

Equivalent to HT2_2002v70 hybrid geoid model minus CGG2013a geoid model (i.e. CT code 9985 minus CT 10110).

CGVD28 height to CGVD2013a(2010) height (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset by Grid Interpolation (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::10115'

Equivalent to HT2_2010v70 hybrid geoid model minus CGG2013a geoid model (i.e. CT code 9986 minus CT 9247 = CT 9987 minus CT 10109). Specifies NAD83(CSRS)v6 as interpolation CRS, but NAD83(CSRS)v7 (code 8255) may equally be used.

CH1903 to CH1903+ (1)
---------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15486'

For improved accuracy (0.01m) use CHENyx06 interpolation programme FINELTRA. File CHENyx06 replaced by CHENyx06a; there is a small area at the border of the data where some more real data has been introduced. swisstopo consider the change insignificant.

CH1903 to CHTRS95 (1)
---------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7673'

Equivalent to concatenation of transformations 15486 (CH1903 to CH1903+) and 1509 (CH1903+ to CHTRS95) to within 2cm. Also used as transformation between CH1903 and ETRS89 (see code 7674).

CH1903 to ETRS89 (2)
--------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7674'

Equivalent to concatenation of CTs 15486 (CH1903 to CH1903+) and 1647 (CH1903+ to CHTRS95) to within 2cm. Also used as CT between CH1903 and CHTRS95 (see code 7673). Replaces CT code 1646. May be used as approximate CT CH1903 to WGS 84 - see code 7788.

CH1903+ to CHTRS95 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1509'

This transformation is also given as CH1903+ to ETRS89 (1) (code 1647). CHTRS95 is a national realization of ETRS89.

CH1903+ to ETRS89 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1647'

This transformation is also given as CH1903+ to CHTRS95 (1) (code 1509). CHTRS95 is a national realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation CH1903+ to WGS 84 - see code 1676.

CHTRS95 to ETRS89 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8895'

CHTRS95 is a national realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation CHTRS95 to WGS 84 - see code 1511.

CI1979 to NZGD2000 (1)

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1082'

CR05 to CR-SIRGAS (1)
---------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Costa Rica - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9751'

Derived at 16 stations. Transformation is valid at epoch 2014.59 but accuracy will deteriorate due to tectonic deformation. May be taken as an approximate transformation to ITRF08 / IGb08 / WGS 84 - see code 9752.

------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Costa Rica - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9752'

Parameter values are from CR05 to CR-SIRGAS (1) (code 9751) assuming that CR-SIRGAS (ITRF08 (IGb08)@2014.59) is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

Camacupa 1948 to RSAO13 (3)
---------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Angola - offshore block 7.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9904'

Parameter values taken from Camacupa 1948 to WGS 84 (6) (code 1323) assuming that RSAO13 is coincident with WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation. Equivalent to concatenation of EPSG:1323 and EPSG:8819.

Camacupa 1948 to RSAO13 (4)
---------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Angola - offshore blocks 1, 16 and 18.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9905'

Camacupa 1948 to WGS 72BE (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Angola - Angola proper - offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1317'

Derived by Geophysical Services Inc. in 1979 from mean of Transit results at 7 stations.

Camacupa 2015 to RSAO13 (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Angola - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8827'

Derived by Univ. of Lisbon for CIDDEMA using 38 REPANGOL points in Angola (except SE) and Cabinda. Average horizontal error 1m, vertical 3m; max radial error 6m.

Camacupa 2015 to WGS 84 (11)
----------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Angola - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8882'

Used by CIDDEMA for delimitation of Angola's EEZ boundary. Derived by Univ. of Lisbon using 38 REPANGOL points. Average horizontal error 1m, vertical 3m; max radial error 6m. Application offshore differs from Camacupa 1948 to WGS 84 by approx 25m.

--------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Argentina - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15782'

Adopted from U.S. Defense Mapping Agency values for Campo Inchauspe to WGS 84 (tfm code 1127) assuming that POSGAR 94 is equivalent to WGS 84.

Campo Inchauspe to WGS 84 (2)
-----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Argentina - Neuquen province - Auca Mahuida area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1527'

Derived through ties at 2 stations (Cerro Colorado and Chihuido Sur) to 4 IGS stations in February 1995

Cape to Hartebeesthoek94 (1)
----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: South Africa - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1504'

Residuals should not exceed 15 metres. Also used to transform Cape to WGS 84 - see code 1129.

Cape to WGS 84 (2)
------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: South Africa - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1129'

Parameter values are from Cape to Hartebeesthoek94 (1) (code 1504) assuming that Hartebeesthoek94 and WGS 84 are equivalent within the accuracy of the transformation. Residuals should not exceed 15 metres.

-------------------------------------

| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

Determined at 5 points. RMS residual 0.013m, maximum residual 0.021m. The Cascais vertical reference surface is below the EVRF2000 vertical reference surface.

Adopted by resolution IGAC 471/May 14, 2020. Supports the Spatial Data Infrastructure for Land Administration (IDE-AT) and its GIS applications. Used to fulfill all the requirements of the activities required for the Multipurpose Cadastre.

Corrego Alegre 1970-72 to SIRGAS 2000 (2)
-----------------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Brazil - onshore - west of 54°W and south of 18°S; also south of 15°S between 54°W and 42°W; also east of 42°W.

Formed by concatenation of tfms codes 6191 and 15485. May be used as transformation between Corrego Alegre 1970-72 and WGS 84 - see tfm code 6194. Used by Petrobras and ANP from February 2005.

Costa Rica Norte
----------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: Costa Rica - onshore north of 9°32'N.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5390'

Costa Rica recognises a 'common zone' between 9°32'N and 9°56'N where either Costa Rica Norte or Costa Rica Sur Lambert zones may be used.

DB_REF to ETRS89 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - onshore - states of Baden-Wurtemberg, Bayern, Berlin, Brandenburg, Bremen, Hamburg, Hessen, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Niedersachsen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Rheinland-Pfalz, Saarland, Sachsen, Sachsen-Anhalt, Schleswig-Holstein, Thuringen.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5826'

Defines DB_REF so considered errorless. Defined with parameter values for forward and reverse CTs with rotation and scale to greater resolution. The OGP truncated values and reversible formula have no impact on calculation results at the micron level.

DGN95 to SRGI2013 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Indonesia - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9472'

Derived at 533 stations. Mean residual 0.218m. Note: information source gives rotations given in radians.

DGN95 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Indonesia - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15912'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that DGN95 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

DHDN to ETRS89 (10)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Germany - Saarland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9310'

Replaces SeTa2009 from 2018-01-15. Derived using the 2016 implementation of ETRS89 / DREF91 and DHHN2016. Coincident with the transformation of cadastral data from DHDN to ETRS89 used by LVGL at a level of 1-2 mm.

DHDN to ETRS89 (3)
------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - states of former West Germany - south of 50°20'N.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1778'

Derived in 2001 at 41 points of the German GPS Network DREF.

DHDN to ETRS89 (4)
------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - states of former West Germany - between 50°20'N and 52°20'N.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1779'

Derived at 27 points of the German GPS Network DREF.

DHDN to ETRS89 (5)
------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - states of former West Germany - onshore north of 52°20'N.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1780'

Derived at 21 points of the German GPS Network DREF.

DHDN to ETRS89 (8)
------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Germany - onshore - states of Baden-Wurtemberg, Bayern, Berlin, Brandenburg, Bremen, Hamburg, Hessen, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Niedersachsen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Rheinland-Pfalz, Saarland, Sachsen, Sachsen-Anhalt, Schleswig-Holstein, Thuringen.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15948'

Developed for ATKIS (Amtliches Topographisch-Kartographisches Informationssystem [Official Topographic and Cartographic Information System]). Provides a uniform transformation across the whole country. May be used as tfm to WGS84 - see tfm code 15949.

DHHN2016 height to EVRF2007 height (1)
--------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Germany - onshore - states of Baden-Wurtemberg, Bayern, Berlin, Brandenburg, Bremen, Hamburg, Hessen, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Niedersachsen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Rheinland-Pfalz, Saarland, Sachsen, Sachsen-Anhalt, Schleswig-Holstein, Thuringen.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7838'

Determined at 425 points. RMS residual 0.017m, maximum residual 0.061m.

------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Germany - states of former West Germany onshore - Baden-Wurtemberg, Bayern, Bremen, Hamburg, Hessen, Niedersachsen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Rheinland-Pfalz, Saarland, Schleswig-Holstein.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5421'

Determined at 363 points. RMS residual 0.004m, maximum residual 0.026m.

Darwin Glacier Lambert Conformal 2000
-------------------------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Antarctica - Darwin Glacier region.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17966'

Replaced by McMurdo Sound Lambert Conformal 2000 (proj code 5475) from March 2011. LINZ S20007 withdrawn at this date.

Datum 73 to ETRS89 (5)
----------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5037'

Derived in July 2009 from 119 common stations. Residuals at 833 test points under 2m. Replaces Datum 73 to ETRS89 (3) (tfm code 1992).

Datum 73 to ETRS89 (6)
----------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6189'

Derived from 1129 common stations in the national geodetic network. Residuals at 130 further test points average 0.06m, maximum 0.16m.

| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

Deception Island to WGS 84 (1)
------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Antarctica - South Shetland Islands - Deception Island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15812'

Accuracy +/- 20m in each axis.

Deir ez Zor to WGS 72BE (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Syria - Deir area (35°22'N, 40°06'E)

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1584'

Recomputed in 1991 by Elf from data derived in 1983 at station 254 Deir by Geco using Transit. Derivation of 1983 parameter values of dX=-163.2 dY=-12.7 dZ=+232.7 contained errors in geodetic parameters for Syria.

Deir ez Zor to WGS 84 (4)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Syria - Shaddadeh area (36°N, 41°E)

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1587'

Derived at four stations by Topnav in 1997.

Deir ez Zor to WGS 84 (5)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Syria - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15742'

Derived for 1998 Omar seismic survey and used in 2000 for El Isba seismic survey.

Deir ez Zor to WGS 84 (6)
-------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Syria - Deir area (35°22'N, 40°06'E)

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15743'

Derived 2005 at 5 triangulation stations and using (EGM96 geoid model +1.15m). Used by Total/DEZPC for Jafra and Mazraa seismic surveys. Can be approximated using geocentric translations of dX=-190.6m, dY=+8.8m, dZ=+239.6m.

Douala 1948 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Cameroon - coastal area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15873'

Derived at Manoca tower assuming the pyramid on the tower and the centre of the tower reservoir are co-located. This assumption carries a few metres uncertainty.

EBBWV14-TM
----------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the rail route from Newport (Park Junction) to Ebbw Vale.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9942'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to EBBWV14-IRF (1) (code 9941), emulates the EBBWV14 Snake projection.

ECML14_NB-TM
------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to rail routes from Newcastle Central to Ashington via Benton North Junction, and the section from Bedlington to Morpeth.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9760'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to ECML14_NB-IRF (1) (code 9759), emulates the ECML14_NB Snake projection.

ED50 to ED87 (1)
----------------
| Method: Reversible polynomial of degree 4
| Extent: Denmark - North Sea; Germany - North Sea; Netherlands - offshore; Norway - North Sea south of 62°N; United Kingdom (UKCS) - North Sea south of 62°N.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15753'

Latitude differences from ED50 to ED87 in decimal degrees given by coefficients A0 through A14 where U=(latitude - 55) degrees and V=longitude in decimal degrees. Longitude differences given through coefficients B0 through B14.

ED50 to ED87 (2)
----------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Norway - offshore north of 65°N. Also Svalbard.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1147'


ED50 to ETRS89 (1)
------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Norway - offshore north of 65°N. Also Svalbard.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1588'

Included in Statens Kartverk programme wsktrans from 1997. The same parameter values were adopted for ED50 to WGS84 (variant 23) transformation offshore Norway north of 62N from April 2001 - see code 1612.

ED50 to ETRS89 (10)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: France - onshore and offshore, mainland and Corsica (France métropolitaine including Corsica).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1650'

These same parameter values are used to transform to WGS 84. See ED50 to WGS 84 (17) (code 1275).

ED50 to ETRS89 (13)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5040'

Parameter values taken from ED50 to WGS 84 (33) (tfm code 1985) assuming that ETRS89 and WGS 84 are the same within the accuracy of the transformation.

ED50 to ETRS89 (14)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Spain - Catalonia onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5661'

When included in concatenation from and to projected CRSs, gives same results as ED50 / UTM zone 31N to ETRS89 / UTM zone 31N (1) - see CRS code 5166.

ED50 to ETRS89 (15)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - offshore North Sea. Netherlands - offshore east of 5E.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9224'

Parameter values from ED50 to WGS 84 (36) (CT 1998) assuming that ETRS89 is equivalent to WGS 84 at epoch 1989.00.

| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Spain - mainland and Ceuta - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9408'

Replaces ED50 to ETRS89 (12) (code 15932).

ED50 to WGS 84 (1)
------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Austria; Belgium; Denmark; Finland; Faroe islands; France; Germany (west); Gibraltar; Greece; Italy; Luxembourg; Netherlands; Norway; Portugal; Spain; Sweden; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1133'

Derived at 85 stations. Accuracy 3m, 8m and 5m in X, Y and Z axes. In Germany will be accepted by LBA for minerals management purposes as alternative to tfm 1052 or 1998.

Derived at 2 stations. Accuracy 25m in each axis.

ED50 to WGS 84 (18)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Denmark - offshore North Sea; Ireland - offshore; Netherlands - offshore; United Kingdom - UKCS offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1311'

Recommended CT for UKCS and IrishCS petroleum purposes, known as "Common Offshore". Based on ED50 to WGS 72 (precise ephemeris) 6-nations agreement of 1981 with which precise to broadcast and broadcast to WGS 84 transformations have been concatenated.

------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1134'

ED50 to WGS 84 (24)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Norway - offshore south of 62°N - North Sea.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1613'

Approximation to 1 metre of concatenated transformation ED50 to WGS 84 (14), code 8653. 8653 remains the transformation promulgated by Statens Kartverk but 1613 recommended by EPSG for practical oil industry usage.

ED50 to WGS 84 (3)
------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iraq, Israel, Jordan, Lebanon, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia and Syria - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1135'

Accuracy estimate not available. Note: ED50 is not used in Israel, Lebanon, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia or Syria.

ED50 to WGS 84 (31)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Egypt - Western Desert.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1810'

Derived via concatenation through WGS72. The ED50 to WGS72 step is the Sepplin 1974 value for all Europe.

ED50 to WGS 84 (36)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - offshore North Sea.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1998'

Approximation to better than 0.5m of CT adopted in June 2003 (see ED50 to WGS 84 (35), code 1052). Recommended for Germany North Sea petroleum purposes. Acceptable to Landesbergamt for Lower Saxony and Bundesanstalt für Seeschifffahrt und Hydrographie.

ED50(ED77) to WGS 84 (2)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iran - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1141'

Given by DMA as from ED50. OGP interpret that as ED50(ED77) in Iran. Derived at 27 stations. Accuracy 9m, 12m and 11m in X, Y and Z axes.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1858'

Derived by Geoid for Elf in 1999. EGM96 geoid used.

ED50(ED77) to WGS 84 (6)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iran - South Pars field phase 11.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15745'

Derived in Tombak district in March 2005. Used for South Pars phase 11.

| Extent: Europe - west.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15752'

Derived at 22 stations. Accuracy 3m in each axis.

------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Europe - west.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::4078'

May be used as a transformation between ED87 and WGS 84 - see tfm code 3905.

ELD79 to WGS 84 (2)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Libya - Murzuq and En Naga fields.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1860'

Derived December 2001 by NAGECO. 3-dimensional SD at 11 points is 0.5m. Connected to ITRF via Remsa 2000 data. Used by TotalFinaElf.

ELD79 to WGS 84 (4)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Libya - Mabruk field.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1862'

Derived by Geoid in 2000 from ITRF connection by NAGECO for TotalFinaElf. For historic compatibility TFE use the 1994 tfm ELD79 to WGS 84 (3) (code 1861) rather than this transformation.

EOMA height 1980 to EVRF2000 height (1)
---------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Hungary.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5424'

Determined at 35 points. RMS residual 0.003m.

EOS21-TM
--------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the complex of rail routes in the East of Scotland, incorporating the route from Tweedbank through the Borders to Edinburgh; the line from Edinburgh to Aberdeen; routes via Kirkaldy and Cowdenbeath; and routes via Leuchars and Perth to Dundee.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9738'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to EOS-IRF (1) (code 9740), emulates the EOS21 Snake projection.

EPSG Alaska Polar Stereographic
-------------------------------
| Method: Polar Stereographic (variant A)
| Extent: Northern hemisphere - north of 60°N onshore and offshore, including Arctic.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5901'


EPSG Arctic LCC zone 1-21
-------------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Arctic - between 87°50'N and 82°50'N, approximately 180°W to approximately 120°W. May be extended westwards or eastwards within the latitude limits.

EST92 to ETRS89 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Estonia - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1331'


EST97 to ETRS89 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Estonia - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1648'

EST97 is a national realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation EST97 to WGS 84 - see code 1649.

ETRF2000-PL to Baltic 1986 height (1)
-------------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (PL txt)
| Extent: Poland - onshore.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9717'

For reversible alternative to this transformation see ETRF2000-PL to ETRF2000-PL + Baltic 1986 height (1) (code 9718).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9916'

Parameter file taken from ETRS89 to Belfast height (2). Belfast is a member of the BI ensemble. For reversible alternative to this transformation see ETRS89 to ETRS89 + BI height (2) (code 9917).

-----------------------

ETRS89 to ETRS89 + Baltic 1957 height (1)
-----------------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8361'

Uses ETRS89 (realization ETRF2000) and quasigeoid model DVRM05. 1 sigma = 34 mm (test performed on 563 independent points). Recommended as part of transformation between Baltic 1957 height and EVRF2007 height (see concatenated operation code 8363).

ETRS89 to OSGB36 / British National Grid (3)
--------------------------------------------
| Method: Ordnance Survey National Transformation
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - offshore to boundary of UKCS within 49°45'N to 61°N and 9°W to 2°E; onshore Great Britain (England, Wales and Scotland). Isle of Man onshore.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7953'

Replaces ETRS89 to OSGB36 / British National Grid (2) (code 7952). May be approximated to better than 0.03m using NTv2 method - see tfm code 7709.

ETRS89 to Ostend height (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (txt)
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9908'

Based on gravimetric quasi-geoid NLGEO2018 fitted to 3707 benchmarks of the Ostend height leveling network. SD of 1 cm. In use from 2018-08-01. For reversible alternative to this transformation see ETRS89 to ETRS89 + Ostend height (1) (code 9909).

ETRS89 to S-JTSK [JTSK03] (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8365'

Derived at 684 points with known S-JTSK and ETRS89 (ETRF2000 realization) coordinates. Scale parameter was constrained to be zero. UGKK consider this transformation to not be reversible at the 1mm accuracy level: for reverse see transformation code 8367.

ETRS89 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Europe - onshore and offshore: Albania; Andorra; Austria; Belgium; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Croatia; Cyprus; Czechia; Denmark; Estonia; Faroe Islands; Finland; France; Germany; Gibraltar; Greece; Hungary; Ireland; Italy; Kosovo; Latvia; Liechtenstein; Lithuania; Luxembourg; Malta; Moldova; Monaco; Montenegro; Netherlands; North Macedonia; Norway including Svalbard and Jan Mayen; Poland; Portugal; Romania; San Marino; Serbia; Slovakia; Slovenia; Spain; Sweden; Switzerland; United Kingdom (UK) including Channel Islands and Isle of Man; Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1149'

ETRS89 and WGS 84 are realizations of ITRS coincident to within 1 metre. This transformation has an accuracy equal to the coincidence figure.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9710'


EWR2-TM
-------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to East West Rail (Phase 2) routes from Oxford to Bicester, Bletchley and Bedford, and from Claydon Junction to Aylesbury and Princes Risborough.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9765'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to EWR2-IRF (1) (code 9764), emulates the EWR2 Snake projection.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15806'

| Extent: Egypt - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7697'

Egypt Gulf of Suez S-650 TL to WGS 72BE (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Egypt - Gulf of Suez.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15792'

Derived by Egypt Surveys Limited through single point Transit translocation at 1 station (S-650).

Egypt Gulf of Suez S-650 TL to WGS 84 (2)
-----------------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Egypt - Gulf of Suez.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15846'

Sometime referred to as "Egypt 1907 to WGS 84". However, application to WGS 84 coordinates of the reverse of this tfm results in Gulf of Suez S-650 TL, not Egypt 1907, position. Gulf of Suez S-650 TL and Egypt 1907 CRSs differ by some 20 metres.

Equal Earth Americas
--------------------

Estonian National Grid
----------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Estonia - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19938'

Coordinates at the projection origin match those of TM Baltic 93.

Europe Conformal 2001
---------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Europe - European Union (EU) countries and candidates. Europe - onshore and offshore: Albania; Andorra; Austria; Belgium; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Croatia; Cyprus; Czechia; Denmark; Estonia; Faroe Islands; Finland; France; Germany; Gibraltar; Greece; Hungary; Iceland; Ireland; Italy; Kosovo; Latvia; Liechtenstein; Lithuania; Luxembourg; Malta; Monaco; Montenegro; Netherlands; North Macedonia; Norway including Svalbard and Jan Mayen; Poland; Portugal including Madeira and Azores; Romania; San Marino; Serbia; Slovakia; Slovenia; Spain including Canary Islands; Sweden; Switzerland; Turkey; United Kingdom (UK) including Channel Islands and Isle of Man; Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19985'

TMzn used for applications at scales larger than 1:500,000. LAEA (code 19986) used for statistical mapping.

Europe Equal Area 2001
----------------------
| Method: Lambert Azimuthal Equal Area
| Extent: Europe - European Union (EU) countries and candidates. Europe - onshore and offshore: Albania; Andorra; Austria; Belgium; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Croatia; Cyprus; Czechia; Denmark; Estonia; Faroe Islands; Finland; France; Germany; Gibraltar; Greece; Hungary; Iceland; Ireland; Italy; Kosovo; Latvia; Liechtenstein; Lithuania; Luxembourg; Malta; Monaco; Montenegro; Netherlands; North Macedonia; Norway including Svalbard and Jan Mayen; Poland; Portugal including Madeira and Azores; Romania; San Marino; Serbia; Slovakia; Slovenia; Spain including Canary Islands; Sweden; Switzerland; Turkey; United Kingdom (UK) including Channel Islands and Isle of Man; Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19986'

LCC (code 19985) used for conformal mapping.

FD54 to ED50 (1)
----------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Faroe Islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15866'

Derived at 3 points in 1976. This transformation then used to define ED50 on the Faroe Islands.

FD58 to WGS 84 (1)
------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iran - Kangan district.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1513'

Derived in 1998 in Kangan district by Geoid for Total. Used for South Pars phases 2 and 3.

FNL22-TM
--------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the rail route from Inverness to Thurso and Wick.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9976'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to FNL22-IRF (1) (code 9975), emulates the FNL22 Snake projection.

Fahud to WGS 84 (3)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Oman - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6908'

Derived at 11 stations. Accuracy 3m, 3m and 6m in X, Y and Z axes. Replaces Fahud to WGS 84 (1) (code 1256).

Fiji 1956 to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Fiji - onshore - Vanua Levu, Taveuni, Viti Levu and and immediately adjacent smaller islands of Yasawa and Kandavu groups.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15875'

Derived at 20 stations. Also published by NGA in GeoTrans v3.4 software with parameter values rounded to integer.

Fiji 1986 to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Fiji - onshore. Includes Viti Levu, Vanua Levu, Taveuni, the Yasawa Group, the Kadavu Group, the Lau Islands and Rotuma Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15876'

Approximation at the +/- 2m level assuming that Fiji 1986 is equivalent to WGS 72. Parameter values taken from WGS 72 to WGS 84 (1) (tfm code 1237).

Fiji Map Grid
-------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Fiji - onshore. Includes Viti Levu, Vanua Levu, Taveuni, the Yasawa Group, the Kadavu Group, the Lau Islands and Rotuma Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19859'

Replaces Viti Levu Grid and Vanua Levu Grid (codes 19878-79).

GBK19-TM
--------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the rail route from Glasgow to Kilmarnock via Barrhead and the branch to East Kilbride.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9455'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to GBK19-IRF (1) (code 9454), emulates the GBK19 Snake projection.

GCGD59 to CIGD11 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Cayman Islands - Grand Cayman.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6136'

May be taken as approximate transformation GCGD61 to WGS 84 - see code 6142.

GDA2020 to AHD height (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory, New South Wales, Northern Territory, Queensland, South Australia, Tasmania, Western Australia and Victoria - onshore. Christmas Island - onshore. Cocos and Keeling Islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8451'

File name previously called AUSGeoid2020_windows_binary.gsb. Uncertainties given in accompanying file AUSGeoid2020_20180201_error.gsb. For reversible alternative to this transformation see GDA2020 to GDA2020 + AHD height (1) (code 9466).

GDA2020 to AVWS height (2)
--------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9692'

AGQG is used to realise AVWS. Uncertainties (4-8 cm across mainland Australia) given in accompanying file AGQG_uncertainty_20201120.gsb. For reversible alternative to this transformation see GDA2020 to GDA2020 + AVWS height (2) (code 9693).

GDA2020 to GDA2020 + AHD height (1)
-----------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory, New South Wales, Northern Territory, Queensland, South Australia, Tasmania, Western Australia and Victoria - onshore. Christmas Island - onshore. Cocos and Keeling Islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9466'

Reversible alternative to GDA2020 to AHD height (1) (code 8451). Uncertainties given in accompanying file AUSGeoid2020_20180201_error.gsb

GDA2020 to GDA2020 + AVWS height (2)
------------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9693'

Reversible alternative to GDA2020 to AVWS height (1) (code 9692). AGQG is used to realise AVWS. Uncertainties (4-8 cm across mainland Australia) given in accompanying file AGQG_uncertainty_20201120.gsb.

GDA2020 to WGS 84 (2)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8450'

Approximation at the 3m level assuming WGS 84 is equivalent to GDA2020. Ignores the low accuracy of the WGS 84 ensemble and the inconsistent application of tectonic plate motion to WGS 84 data.

GDA2020 to WGS 84 (G1762) (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8448'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Parameter values taken from ITRF2014 to GDA2020 (1) (code 8049), assuming WGS 84 (G1762) is equivalent to ITRF2014 within the accuracy of the transformation.

GDA94 to GDA2020 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8048'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9. See CT codes 8444-46 for NTv2 method giving equivalent results for Christmas Island, Cocos Islands and Australia respectively. See CT code 8447 for alternative including distortion model for Australia only.

GDA94 to GDA2020 (2)
--------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory; New South Wales; Northern Territory; Queensland; South Australia; Tasmania; Western Australia; Victoria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8447'

See GDA94 to GDA2020 (1) or (3) (codes 8048 and 8446) for alternative conformal-only transformation without local distortion modelling. GDA2020 Technical Manual and fact sheet T1 give guidance on which to use.

GDA94 to GDA94 + AHD height (1)
-------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory, New South Wales, Northern Territory, Queensland, South Australia, Tasmania, Western Australia and Victoria - onshore. Christmas Island - onshore. Cocos and Keeling Islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9467'

Reversible alternative to GDA94 to AHD height (1) (code 5656). Uses AUSGeoid09 model which uses bi-cubic interpolation; bi-linear interpolation of the grid file will give results agreeing to within 1cm 99.97% of the time.

GDBD2009 to WGS 84 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Brunei Darussalam - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6701'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that GDBD2009 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

GGRS87 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Greece - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1272'


GHA height to EVRF2000 Austria height (1)
-----------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset by Grid Interpolation (BEV AT)
| Extent: Austria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9275'

Care! Austrian literature describes this transformation in direction EVRF2000 Austria height to GHA height with offset subtracted. EPSG method has offset as an addition. See method formula and example. The grid is implemented in BEV-Transformator.

GHA height to EVRF2000 height (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Austria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5415'

Determined at 114 points. RMS residual 0.031m, maximum residual 0.061m.

GHA height to EVRF2007 height (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Austria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5557'

Determined at 108 points. RMS residual 0.032m, maximum residual 0.063m.

------------------------

GSK-2011 to WGS 84 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Russian Federation - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9773'

For many purposes GSK-2011 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84. This approximation ignores the low accuracy of the WGS 84 ensemble and the application of tectonic plate motion to WGS 84 data.

Gambia to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Gambia - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6913'

Derived at 1 station. Accuracy 25m in each axis.

Gauss-Kruger CABA 2019
----------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Argentina - autonomous city of Buenos Aires.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9497'

Projection created in 2017 for the purpose of modernizing the city's cadastre and linking it to modern reference frames. Origin approximates the 1919 origin of the cross of the main tower of the San José de Flores church ("0 de Flores" plane grid).

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::16331'

Usually used with zone prefix to FE - see 6-degree Gauss-Kruger zone 31N (code 16231).

Guam 1963 to NAD83(HARN) (2)
----------------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (2D)
| Extent: Guam - onshore. Northern Mariana Islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8665'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; EPSG source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°.

HD1909 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------

HD72 to ETRS89 (2)
------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Hungary.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1449'

Derived at 1153 stations of the Hungarian National GPS Network. Values here correct parameter errors given in Hungarian standard MSZ 7222:2002. Replaces HD72 to ETRS89 (1), code 1829. May be taken as approximate tfm HD72 to WGS 84 - see tfm code 1448.

HKPD depth to HKCD depth (1)
----------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: China - Hong Kong - offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7977'

The HKPD vertical reference surface is 0.146m above the HKCD surface.

HS2-TM
------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - HS2 phases 1 and 2a railway corridor from London to Birmingham, Lichfield and Crewe.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9301'

In conjunction with transformation HS2TN15 (code 9302) emulates the zero-distortion Snake projection HS2P1+14. Emulation derived at 350,000 locations, RMS position difference is 0.15 mm and max position difference is 0.6 mm; this is considered errorless.

HTRS96 to ETRS89 (1)

| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Croatia - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15966'

May be taken as approximate transformation HTRS96 to WGS 84 - see code 15967.

HULLEE13-TM
-----------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the rail route from the Morley tunnel through Leeds to Hull.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9966'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to HULLEE13-IRF (1) (code 9965), emulates the HULLEE13 Snake projection.

Height <> Depth Conversion
--------------------------
| Method: Height Depth Reversal
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7812'

This is a parameter-less conversion to reverse the positive direction of the axis of a vertical CRS. Source and target CRSs must both have the same unit of measure.

Hjorsey 1955 to WGS 84 (2)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iceland - mainland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6909'

Derived at 16 stations. Accuracy 3m, 3m and 6m in X, Y and Z axes. Replaces Hjorsey 1955 to WGS 84 (1) (code 1951).

Hokitika 2000
-------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Hokitika meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17947'

Replaces Hokitika Circuit (code 17917) after 1st March 2000.

Hokitika Circuit
----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Hokitika meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17917'

Replaced Imperial measure circuit in 1972. Replaced by Hokitika 2000 (code 17947) from March 2000.

Hong Kong 1963 Grid
-------------------
| Method: Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: China - Hong Kong - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19896'

Replaced by HK1980 Grid.

Hong Kong 1963(67) to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - Hong Kong - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15842'

Derived at 2 satellite stations. Accuracy +/- 1m. Care: does not use Hong Kong 1963 (code 4838) as the source CRS.

Hong Kong 1980 Grid
-------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: China - Hong Kong - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19978'

Grid origin is Partiridge Hill triangulation station (old trig "2").

Hong Kong 1980 to Hong Kong Geodetic CS (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - Hong Kong - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9913'

Derived via ITRF96 @ 1998.121. Published 2002-03-01. Also published as a transformation to WGS 84 - see Hong Kong 1980 to WGS 84 (1) (code 1825).

Hong Kong Geodetic CS to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - Hong Kong - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8439'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that Hong Kong Geodetic CS is equivalent to WGS 84.

Hu Tzu Shan 1950 to WGS 84 (1)
------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Taiwan, Republic of China - onshore - Taiwan Island, Penghu (Pescadores) Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1152'

Derived at 4 stations. Accuracy 15m in each axis.

IBCAO Polar Stereographic
-------------------------
| Method: Polar Stereographic (variant B)
| Extent: Northern hemisphere - north of 60°N onshore and offshore, including Arctic.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19840'

Used for the International Bathymetric Chart of Arctic Ocean.

IBCSO Polar Stereographic
-------------------------
| Method: Polar Stereographic (variant B)
| Extent: Southern hemisphere - south of 50°S onshore and offshore, including Antarctica.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9353'

Used for the International Bathymetric Chart of the Southern Ocean.

ICN Regional
------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Venezuela - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19976'


ID74 to DGN95 (1)
-----------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Indonesia - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15911'

Derived at 38 stations. Standard deviations of translations are 1.3, 1.1 and 3.6m, of rotations 0.11, 0.06 and 0.04 sec and ppm 0.18. May be taken as a tfm ID74 to WGS 84 - see tfm 1833.

IGCB 1955 to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: The Democratic Republic of the Congo (Zaire) - Lower Congo (Bas Congo)

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15787'

Derived by Topnav in 1991 at station TSH 85.

IGD05 to IG05 Intermediate CRS
------------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7140'

Defines the IG05 Intermediate CRS so is considered errorless. Target CRS is referred to in Israeli documentation as "in GRS80". Replaced by IG05/12 transformation (code 6993).

IGD05 to IGD05/12
-----------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Israel - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6992'


IGD05/12 to IG05/12 Intermediate CRS
------------------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6993'

Replaces IGD05 transformation (code 7140). Defines the IG05/12 Intermediate CRS so is considered errorless. Israeli documentation refers to target CRS as "in GRS80". Use this CT for cadastre and precise engineering but see CTs 9186 or 9189 for GIS use.

IGM95 to ETRS89 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Italy - onshore and offshore; San Marino, Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1098'

IGM95 is the first Italian realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation IGM95 to WGS 84 - see code 1099. For accurate transformation to a later realization see IGM95 to RDN2008 (1) (CT code 9737).

IGN 1962 Kerguelen to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: French Southern Territories - Kerguelen onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15850'

Also published in US NIMA/NGA TR8350.2 which gives accuracy of +/-25m in each axis and states that derived at one station.

| Extent: New Caledonia - Loyalty Islands - Mare.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15891'

Determined in April 1993, modified in December 1999.

IGN72 Grande Terre to RGNC91-93 (4)
-----------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translation by Grid Interpolation (IGN)
| Extent: New Caledonia - Grande Terre.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9329'

Developed in July 2002 and officially adopted in August 2005. May be emulated using NTv2 method - see RGNC91-93 to IGN72 Grande Terre (6) (code 15962).
