IGRS to WGS 84 (1)
------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iraq - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::3894'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that IGRS is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

IGS00 to IGb00 (1)
------------------
| Method: Time-specific Position Vector transform (geocen)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9034'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. IGS00 and IGb00 are both by definition aligned with ITRF2000. The actual IGS00-IGb00 transformation parameter values are not null but are statistically insignificant and treated as null by IGS.

IGS05 to IGS08 (1)
------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9036'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

IGS08 to IGRS (1)
-----------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (PV geocentric domain)
| Extent: Iraq - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6935'

Derived by least squares adjustment from the coordinates of the IRAQ-CORS network in both CRSs. Station Baghdad was excluded (high residuals). RMSE = 0.004 m. Application yields identical results to transformation 6936.

IGS08 to IGRS (2)
-----------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geocentric domain)
| Extent: Iraq - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6936'

Derived by least squares adjustment from the coordinates of the IRAQ-CORS network in both CRSs. Station Baghdad was excluded (high residuals). RMSE = 0.004 m. Application yields identical results to transformation 6935.

IGb08 to IGS14 (1)
------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9038'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Parameter values from ITRS2008 to ITRS2014 (1) (code 7790) as IGb08 is aligned to ITRF2008 and IGS14 is aligned to ITRF2014.

IKBD-92 to WGS 84 (4)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iraq - Kuwait boundary.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1993'

This transformation was exact in 1992, deteriorating with tectonic plate motion at several centimetres per year.

IRENET95 to ETRS89 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Ireland - onshore. United Kingdom (UK) - Northern Ireland (Ulster) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1611'

IRENET95 is a regional realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation IRENET95 to WGS 84 - see code 1678.

ISN2004 to ISN2016 (1)
----------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Iceland - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9233'

Grid transformation based on Kriging between ISN2004 and ISN2016. Accuracy is better than 5 cm in stable areas but can be around 25 cm in areas that have suffered deformation due to earthquake or volcanic eruption.

ISN2004 to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iceland - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5327'

For many purposes ISN2004 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84.

ISN2016 to ISH2004 height (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (Gravsoft)
| Extent: Iceland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9958'

File also available in NOAA VDatum format (Icegeoid_ISN2016.gtx). For reversible alternative to this transformation see ISN2016 to ISN2016 + ISH2004 height (1) (CT code 9959). Replaces Icegeoid_ISN2004 (code 9956).

ISN2016 to ISN2016 + ISH2004 height (1)
---------------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (Gravsoft)
| Extent: Iceland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9959'

Reversible alternative to ISN2016 to ISH2004 height (1) (CT code 9958). File is also available in NOAA VDatum format (Icegeoid_ISN2016.gtx). Replaces Icegeoid_ISN2004.

ISN2016 to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iceland - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9291'

For many purposes ISN2016 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84.

ISN93 to ISN2016 (1)
--------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Iceland - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9232'

Grid transformation based on Kriging between ISN93 and ISN2016. Accuracy is better than 5 cm in stable areas but can be around 25 cm in areas that have suffered deformation due to earthquake or volcanic eruption.

ISN93 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iceland - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1952'

For many purposes ISN93 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84.

ITRF2000 to ETRF2000 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Europe - onshore and offshore: Albania; Andorra; Austria; Belgium; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Croatia; Cyprus; Czechia; Denmark; Estonia; Faroe Islands; Finland; France; Germany; Gibraltar; Greece; Hungary; Ireland; Italy; Kosovo; Latvia; Liechtenstein; Lithuania; Luxembourg; Malta; Moldova; Monaco; Montenegro; Netherlands; North Macedonia; Norway including Svalbard and Jan Mayen; Poland; Portugal; Romania; San Marino; Serbia; Slovakia; Slovenia; Spain; Sweden; Switzerland; United Kingdom (UK) including Channel Islands and Isle of Man; Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7940'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. See ITRF2000 to ETRF2000 (2) (code 7941) for an exactly equivalent transformation but with the transformation's parameter values at epoch 2000.00.

ITRF2000 to GDA94 (2)
---------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia - onshore and offshore to 200 nautical mile EEZ boundary. Includes Lord Howe Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6278'

RMS residuals 3mm N, 8mm E and 55mm up, maximum residuals 5mm N, 13mm E and 84mm up. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Replaces 2001 transformation by Dawson and Steed, tfm code 6315.

ITRF2000 to IGS00 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Time-specific Position Vector transform (geocen)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9029'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. IGS00 is by definition aligned with ITRF2000.

ITRF2000 to ITRF2014 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8078'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Derived by IERS from previously published information.

ITRF2000 to ITRF2020 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9994'

IERS describes CT in opposite direction. Parameter values derived from the those between ITRF2020, ITRF2014 and ITRF2008 and those published between earlier realizations. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9.

ITRF2000 to NAD83(CORS96) (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Puerto Rico - onshore and offshore. United States (USA) onshore and offshore - Alabama; Alaska; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming. US Virgin Islands - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6866'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Joint derivation by Canada and US (tfm 6864) concatenated with IGS value for ITRF96>97 and IERS ITRF97>2000 transformations. See tfm 8261 for Canadian equivalent.

ITRF2000 to NAD83(CSRS)v4 (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8261'

Concatenation of joint Canada-US NAD83>ITRF96 tfm (code 8259) with IGS value of ITRF96>ITRF97 and IERS tfm ITRF97>ITRF2000. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. See tfm code 6866 for US equivalent.

ITRF2000 to NAD83(MARP00) (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Guam, Northern Mariana Islands and Palau; onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9077'

Defines NAD83(MARP00). Equivalent transformation published on NGS web site and used in HDTP with rX=28.971 mas, rY=10.420 mas and rZ=8.928 mas at epoch 1997.00.

ITRF2000 to NAD83(PACP00) (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: American Samoa, Marshall Islands, United States (USA) - Hawaii, United States minor outlying islands; onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9078'

Defines NAD83(PACP00). Equivalent transformation published on NGS web site and used in HDTP with rX=27.741 mas, rY=13.469 mas and rZ=2.712 mas at epoch 1997.00.

ITRF2000 to SIRGAS-CON DGF05P01 (1)
-----------------------------------
| Method: Time-specific Position Vector transform (geocen)
| Extent: Latin America - Central America and South America, onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8957'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

ITRF2005 to GDA94 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia - onshore and offshore to 200 nautical mile EEZ boundary. Includes Lord Howe Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6277'

RMS residuals 4mm north, 8mm east and 30mm vertical, maximum residuals 10mm north, 17 mm east and 61mm vertical. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

---------------------
| Method: Time-specific Position Vector transform (geocen)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9030'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. IGS05 is by definition aligned with ITRF2005.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9643'

------------------------

| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9993'

IERS describes CT in opposite direction. Parameter values derived from the those between ITRF2020, ITRF2014 and ITRF2008 and those published between earlier realizations. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9.

ITRF2005 to NAD83(CSRS)v5 (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9227'

Concatenation of joint Canada-US NAD83>ITRF96 transformation (code 8259) with IGS value for ITRF96>ITRF97 and IERS transformations ITRF97>ITRF2005. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

ITRF2005 to SA LLD height (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (txt)
| Extent: South Africa - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9280'

Hybrid geoid referenced to ITRF2005@2010.02. Accuracy 7cm at 1 sigma. For reversible alternative to this transformation see ITRF2005 to ITRF2005 + SA LLD height (1) (code 9643).

ITRF2008 to CGVD2013a(2010) height (2)
--------------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9125'

Replaces CT code 9124. Uses CGG2013a model at epoch 2010.0. In ITRF the CGVD2013 geoid velocity is not zero so CGVD2013 heights derived through ITRF change with respect to those derived through NAD83(CSRS). CGRSC recommends using NAD83(CSRS) (code 9247).

ITRF2008 to GDA94 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia - onshore and offshore to 200 nautical mile EEZ boundary. Includes Lord Howe Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6276'

RMS residuals 5mm north, 8mm east and 28mm vertical, maximum residuals 10mm north, 13mm east and 51mm vertical. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

ITRF2008 to IG05/12 Intermediate CRS
------------------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9186'

Derived from Israeli CORS on ITRF2008 at epoch 2018.50. Updates CT 6993 for approx. 40cm tectonic plate motion 2012 to 2019 for GIS purposes. CT 6993 remains the legal definition of IG05/12 and must be used for cadastral and precise engineering purposes.

ITRF2008 to NAD83(2011) (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Puerto Rico - onshore and offshore. United States (USA) onshore and offshore - Alabama; Alaska; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming. US Virgin Islands - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7807'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Joint derivation by Canada and US (tfm 6864) concatenated with IGS value for ITRF96>97 and IERS ITRF97>2008 transformations. See tfm 8264 for Canadian equivalent.

ITRF2008 to NAD83(CSRS)v6 (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8264'

Concatenation of joint Canada-US transformation NAD83>ITRF96 (code 8259) with IGS tfm ITRF96>97 and IERS tfms ITRF97>2008. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. See tfm code 7807 for US equivalent.

ITRF2014 to ETRF2014 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Europe - onshore and offshore: Albania; Andorra; Austria; Belgium; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Croatia; Cyprus; Czechia; Denmark; Estonia; Faroe Islands; Finland; France; Germany; Gibraltar; Greece; Hungary; Ireland; Italy; Kosovo; Latvia; Liechtenstein; Lithuania; Luxembourg; Malta; Moldova; Monaco; Montenegro; Netherlands; North Macedonia; Norway including Svalbard and Jan Mayen; Poland; Portugal; Romania; San Marino; Serbia; Slovakia; Slovenia; Spain; Sweden; Switzerland; United Kingdom (UK) including Channel Islands and Isle of Man; Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8366'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. See ITRF2014 to ETRF2014 (2) (code 8880) for an exactly equivalent transformation but with the transformation's parameter values at epoch 2010.00.

ITRF2014 to GDA2020 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8049'

Derived at 109 stations of the Australian Regional GNSS network (ARGN). RMS residuals 26mm N, 12mm E and 179mm up, maximum residuals 49mm N, 24mm E and 464mm up. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

ITRF2014 to GDA94 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9682'

Concatenation of ITRF2014 to GDA2020 (1) (CT 8049) and GDA94 to GDA2020 (1) (CT 8048). Scale difference in ppb and rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. See ITRF2014 to GDA94 (2) (CT 9683) for alternative for Australia with distortion modelling.

ITRF2014 to KSA-GRF17 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Saudi Arabia - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9334'

Arabian plate rotations derived from obs. at 41 sites with at least 2.5 years of continuous observations. May be approximated by position vector CT with rX=8.393", rY=-0.749", rZ=10.276" valid at 2017.00 and degrading by approximately 2.5cm per year.

---------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Puerto Rico - onshore and offshore. ITRF93 to ITRF2020 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9998'

IERS describes CT in opposite direction. Parameter values derived from the those between ITRF2020, ITRF2014 and ITRF2008 and those published between earlier realizations. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9.

ITRF93 to ITRF94 (2)
--------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::10143'

Parameter values derived from differences in CTs to ITRF2020 (codes 9997 and 9998). These supersede all values published in past IERS/ITRF documentation (CT code 9025). Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9.

ITRF93 to NAD83(CSRS96) (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8257'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Superseded by tfm from ITRF94 (see code 8258).

ITRF94 to ETRF94 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Europe - onshore and offshore: Albania; Andorra; Austria; Belgium; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Croatia; Cyprus; Czechia; Denmark; Estonia; Faroe Islands; Finland; France; Germany; Gibraltar; Greece; Hungary; Ireland; Italy; Kosovo; Latvia; Liechtenstein; Lithuania; Luxembourg; Malta; Moldova; Monaco; Montenegro; Netherlands; North Macedonia; Norway including Svalbard and Jan Mayen; Poland; Portugal; Romania; San Marino; Serbia; Slovakia; Slovenia; Spain; Sweden; Switzerland; United Kingdom (UK) including Channel Islands and Isle of Man; Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7937'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

ITRF96 to ETRF96 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Europe - onshore and offshore: Albania; Andorra; Austria; Belgium; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Croatia; Cyprus; Czechia; Denmark; Estonia; Faroe Islands; Finland; France; Germany; Gibraltar; Greece; Hungary; Ireland; Italy; Kosovo; Latvia; Liechtenstein; Lithuania; Luxembourg; Malta; Moldova; Monaco; Montenegro; Netherlands; North Macedonia; Norway including Svalbard and Jan Mayen; Poland; Portugal; Romania; San Marino; Serbia; Slovakia; Slovenia; Spain; Sweden; Switzerland; United Kingdom (UK) including Channel Islands and Isle of Man; Vatican City State.

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

ITRF96 to GDA94 (2)
-------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia - onshore and offshore to 200 nautical mile EEZ boundary. Includes Lord Howe Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6280'

RMS residuals 22mm N, 56mm E and 90mm up, maximum residuals 49mm N, 126mm E and 193mm up. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Replaces 2001 transformation by Dawson and Steed, code 6313.

ITRF96 to NAD83(CORS96) (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Puerto Rico - onshore and offshore. United States (USA) onshore and offshore - Alabama; Alaska; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming. US Virgin Islands - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6864'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Jointly derived by Canada and US at 12 North American VLBI stations. Replaced by tfm code 6865 from 2000-01-01. See tfm code 8259 for Canadian equivalent.

ITRF96 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8259'

Jointly derived by Canada and US at 12 North American VLBI stations. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. See tfm code 6864 for US equivalent.

| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Europe - onshore and offshore: Albania; Andorra; Austria; Belgium; Bosnia and Herzegovina; Bulgaria; Croatia; Cyprus; Czechia; Denmark; Estonia; Faroe Islands; Finland; France; Germany; Gibraltar; Greece; Hungary; Ireland; Italy; Kosovo; Latvia; Liechtenstein; Lithuania; Luxembourg; Malta; Moldova; Monaco; Montenegro; Netherlands; North Macedonia; Norway including Svalbard and Jan Mayen; Poland; Portugal; Romania; San Marino; Serbia; Slovakia; Slovenia; Spain; Sweden; Switzerland; United Kingdom (UK) including Channel Islands and Isle of Man; Vatican City State.

ITRF97 to GDA94 (2)
-------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Australia - onshore and offshore to 200 nautical mile EEZ boundary. Includes Lord Howe Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6279'

RMS residuals 26mm N, 12mm E and 179mm up, maximum residuals 49mm N, 24mm E and 464mm up. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Replaces 2001 transformation by Dawson and Steed, tfm code 6392.

ITRF97 to IGS97 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Time-specific Position Vector transform (geocen)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9028'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. IGS97 is by definition aligned with ITRF97.

ITRF97 to NAD83(CORS96) (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: Puerto Rico - onshore and offshore. United States (USA) onshore and offshore - Alabama; Alaska; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming. US Virgin Islands - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6865'

Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. 1996 derivation (see tfm 6864) concatenated with IGS value of ITRF96>ITRF97. Replaced by tfm code 6865 from 2000-01-01. See tfm code 8260 for Canadian equivalent.

ITRF97 to NAD83(CSRS)v3 (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Position Vector tfm (geocentric)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8260'

Concatenation of joint Canada-US transformation NAD83>ITRF96 (see tfm code 8259) and IGS value for ITRF96>ITRF97 transformation. Scale difference in ppb and scale difference rate in ppb/yr where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. See tfm 6865 for US equivalent.

| Extent: Iceland - mainland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19987'

Used only with Reykjavik geogCRS. Longitude of origin originally defined as 31°30' west of Copenhagen.

See proj code 7173 for authoritative metric definition. Defined by Indiana DOT as two separate zones (one for each county) each having identical defining parameter values: see info source.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7255'

For equivalent non-metric definition see proj code 7256.

Irish Grid
----------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Ireland - onshore. United Kingdom (UK) - Northern Ireland (Ulster) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19972'

Defined as part of the 1965 and 1975 mapping adustments in which the scale factor was introduced as a best fit to retain existing grid coordinates.

Israel 1993 to WGS 84 (2)
-------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9676'

Parameter values from CT code 9186 assuming that WGS 84 is coincident with ITRF2008 and New Israeli Grid 1993 is equivalent to Israeli Grid 05/12 within the accuracy of the transformation. Use in preference to Israel 1993 to WGS 84 (1) (code 1073).

Israeli CS
----------
| Method: Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18203'

Based on proj 18201 but with 1 million added to FN. Note: Palestine Belt (proj code 18202) has identical parameter values: the difference in conversion between the Israeli CS and the Palestine Belt caused by their different methods is under 2m in Israel.

Israeli TM
----------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18204'

Designed to approximate Israeli CRS grid in north-central Israel.

JAD2001 to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Jamaica - onshore and offshore. Includes Morant Cays and Pedro Cays.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15925'

For many practical purposes JAD2001 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84.

JAD69 to JAD2001 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Jamaica - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15926'

Accuracy 0.3 to 0.5 metres. May be used as tfm to WGS 84 - see JAD69 to WGS 84 (3) (tfm code 15927).

JGD2000 (vertical) height to JGD2011 (vertical) height (1)
----------------------------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: Japan - onshore mainland - Hokkaido, Honshu (western part only, see remarks), Shikoku, Kyushu.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6699'

Excludes areas of eastern Honshu affected by 2008 Iwate-Miyagi and 2011 Tohoku earthquakes (Aomori, Iwate, Miyagi, Akita, Yamagata, Fukushima and Ibaraki prefectures).

JGD2000 to JGD2011 (1)
----------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Japan - northern Honshu prefectures affected by 2011 Tohoku earthquake: Aomori, Iwate, Miyagi, Akita, Yamaguta, Fukushima, Ibaraki, Tochigi, Gumma, Saitama, Chiba, Tokyo, Kanagawa, Niigata, Toyama, Ishikawa, Fukui, Yamanashi, Nagano, Gifu.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6713'

NTv2 grid derived by ESRI from that supplied by GSI in application patchjgd.

JGD2000 to JGD2011 (2)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Japan - onshore and offshore, excluding northern prefectures of 'main province' (see remarks).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6698'

Excludes areas of northern Honshu affected by 2008 Iwate-Miyagi and 2011 Tohoku earthquakes. For these areas use GSI PatchJGD application or JGD2000 to JGD2011 (1) (tfm code 6713).

JGD2000 to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Japan - onshore and offshore, excluding northern prefectures of 'main province' (see remarks).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1826'

Excludes area affected by the 2011 Tohoku earthquake. For areas of northern Honshu affected by the earthquake see JGD2000 to WGS 84 (2) (code 9896).

JGD2000 to WGS 84 (2)
---------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Japan - northern Honshu prefectures affected by 2011 Tohoku earthquake: Aomori, Iwate, Miyagi, Akita, Yamaguta, Fukushima, Ibaraki, Tochigi, Gumma, Saitama, Chiba, Tokyo, Kanagawa, Niigata, Toyama, Ishikawa, Fukui, Yamanashi, Nagano, Gifu.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9896'

Parameter file from JGD2000 to JGD2011 (1) (code 6713) assuming that JGD2011 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of this CT. Use for area affected by the 2011 Tohoku earthquake; for areas outside this extent use JGD2000 to WGS 84 (1) (code 1826).

JGD2011 to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Japan - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9936'

---------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Japan - onshore - Kyushu west of approximately 130°E - Nagasaki-ken; islands of Kagoshima-ken between 27°N and 32°N and between 128°18'E and 130°E (between 128°18'E and 30°13'E for Amami islands).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17801'

Original transformation by Gauss-Kruger formula.

Japan Plane Rectangular CS zone II
----------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Japan - onshore - Kyushu east of approximately 130°E - Fukuoka-ken; Saga-ken; Kumamoto-ken; Oita-ken; Miyazaki-ken; Kagoshima-ken (except for area within Japan Plane Rectangular Coordinate System zone I).

Johnston Island 1961 to WGS 84 (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United States Minor Outlying Islands - Johnston Island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15809'

Derived at 2 satellite stations. Accuracy +/- 25m in each axis. Note: NGA online html files carry a different dZ value - OGP believe this is an erroneous transcription from the TR8350.2 line above.

Johor Cassini Grid
------------------
| Method: Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: Malaysia - West Malaysia - Johor.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::4114'

Origin is Gunung Blumut. Replaced by GDM2000 Johor grid (code 19893).

Johor Grid
----------
| Method: Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: Malaysia - West Malaysia - Johor.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19893'

Origin is station GP58 at Institut Haiwan, Kluang. Offset from old grid origin is -14810.562m east, 8758.320m north.

Jurien Coastal Grid

KKJ to ETRS89 (2)
-----------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Finland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::10098'

In most areas accuracy is approximately 0.5m although in some areas it is in the order of 2m. May be taken as approximate transformation KKJ to WGS 84 - see code 10099. Replaces KKJ to ETRS89 (1) (code 1638).

KOC CD height to KOC WD height (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: Kuwait - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7980'

The KOC CD vertical reference surface is 4.74m (15.55ft) below KOC WD surface.

KOC CD height to Kuwait PWD height (1)
--------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: Kuwait - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5450'

The KOC CD vertical reference surface is 0.49m below the PWD surface.

KOC to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Kuwait - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1059'


KOSOVAREF01 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Kosovo.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9144'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that ETRS89 is equivalent to WGS 84. KOSOVAREF01 is a national realization of ETRS89.

KSA-GRF17 to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Saudi Arabia - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9383'

Derived from ITRF2014 to KSA-GRF17 (1) (CT code 9334). Valid at 2017.00 and degrading by approximately 2.5cm per year.

Kalianpur 1962 to WGS 84 (2)
----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Pakistan - offshore Indus fan.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15701'

Derived at Geodetic Survey office in Karachi in 1997.

Kalianpur 1962 to WGS 84 (3)
----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Pakistan - Badin and Mehran blocks.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15702'

Derived at station S0001, an approximate offset to Survey of India primary station Kat Baman, in 1992 from 180 single point Transit passes observed in 1991 by Fugro-Geodetic for UTP.

Kalianpur 1962 to WGS 84 (4)
----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Pakistan - Karachi licence area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15703'

Derived at Chitrawala triangulation station by Fugro-Geodetic for UTP.

Kalianpur 1962 to WGS 84 (5)
----------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Pakistan - East Sind.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9234'

Derived by Western Geophysical for UTP 1996 East Sind 2D survey. Very similar parameter values (higher resolution but no better accuracy) were used by BGP for the ENI 2006 East Sind 2D survey.

Kalianpur 1962 to WGS 84 (6)
----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Pakistan - Gambat.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15494'

Derived by Fugro-Geodetic in 2004 at 6 closely-spaced stations. Used by OMV in all blocks in Pakistan where operator.

| Extent: Sri Lanka - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1157'

Derived at 3 stations. Accuracy 20m in each axis.

Karamea Circuit
---------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Karamea meridional circuit area.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17912'

Karbala 1979 to IGRS (1)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iraq - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5077'

Derived at 95 stations mostly south of Baghdad but including 3 in Kirkuk-Erbil area. Maximum residuals 0.3m. May be used as a tfm to WGS 84 - see tfm code 5078.

------------------------

| Extent: United States (USA) - Kentucky - counties of Anderson; Bath; Boone; Bourbon; Boyd; Bracken; Bullitt; Campbell; Carroll; Carter; Clark; Elliott; Fayette; Fleming; Franklin; Gallatin; Grant; Greenup; Harrison; Henry; Jefferson; Jessamine; Kenton; Lawrence; Lewis; Mason; Menifee; Montgomery; Morgan; Nicholas; Oldham; Owen; Pendleton; Robertson; Rowan; Scott; Shelby; Spencer; Trimble; Woodford.

Kertau 1968 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------

Krovak
------
| Method: Krovak
| Extent: Czechia; Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19952'

Original definition. Longitude is referenced to the Ferro meridian. See projection code 5509 for alternative referenced to the Greenwich meridian and code 5218 for north-orientated alternative introduced for GIS purposes.

Krovak (Greenwich)
------------------
| Method: Krovak
| Extent: Czechia; Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5509'

Longitude is referenced to the Greenwich meridian. See projection code 19952 for original definition referenced to Ferro.

Krovak East North
-----------------
| Method: Krovak (North Orientated)
| Extent: Czechia; Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5218'

Longitude is referenced to the Ferro meridian. North-orientated alternative to south-orientated Krovak projection (code 19952) introduced for GIS purposes.

Krovak East North (Greenwich)
-----------------------------
| Method: Krovak (North Orientated)
| Extent: Czechia; Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5510'

Greenwich-based alternative to projection code 5218.

Kyrg-06 to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Kyrgyzstan.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9768'

For many purposes Kyrg-06 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84. This approximation ignores the low accuracy of the WGS 84 ensemble and the application of tectonic plate motion to WGS 84 data.

LCC Germany
-----------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Germany - onshore - states of Baden-Wurtemberg, Bayern, Berlin, Brandenburg, Bremen, Hamburg, Hessen, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Niedersachsen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Rheinland-Pfalz, Saarland, Sachsen, Sachsen-Anhalt, Schleswig-Holstein, Thuringen.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::4838'

Variant for Germany of LCC Europe (proj code 19985). Gauss-Kruger used for applications at scales larger than 1:500,000.

| Extent: Latvia - onshore and offshore.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8891'

----------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5431'

Determined at 225 points. RMS residual 0.033m, maximum residual 0.094m

LN02 height to EVRF2007 height (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5207'

Determined at 240 points. RMS residual 0.031m, maximum residual 0.085m

LUREF to ETRS89 (7)
-------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (CF geog2D domain)
| Extent: Luxembourg.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9937'

LUREF 2020 parameters. For an equivalent CT using the Coordinate Frame method see CT 9938. Defines LUREF from 2020. Replaces LUREF 2014 parameters (CT 9898). Info source gives this CT in reverse direction. Derived using ETRF2000 @2013-01-27.

LUREF to ETRS89 (8)
-------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Luxembourg.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9938'

LUREF 2020 parameters. For an equivalent CT using the Molodensky-Badekas method see CT 9937. Defines LUREF from 2020. Replaces LUREF 2014 parameters (CT 9899). Info source gives CT in reverse direction. Derived using ETRF2000 @2013-01-27.

La Canoa to PSAD56 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Venezuela - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8674'

In Venezuela PSAD56 is coincident with La Canoa.

La Canoa to REGVEN (1)
----------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (CF geog2D domain)
| Extent: Venezuela - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1771'

May be used as transformation to WGS 84 - see La Canoa to WGS 84 (13) (code 1096)

La Canoa to WGS 84 (13)
-----------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (CF geog2D domain)
| Extent: Venezuela - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1096'

Parameter values are from La Canoa to REGVEN (1) (code 1771) assuming that REGVEN is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

La Canoa to WGS 84 (18)
-----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Venezuela - east - Delta Amacuro; Anzoategui; Bolivar; Monagas; Sucre states.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1516'

Parameter values estimated accuracy: ± 2.0m; ± 2.7m; ± 1.3m respectively. Also used for PSAD56 to WGS 84 transformations.

Laborde Grid
------------
| Method: Laborde Oblique Mercator
| Extent: Madagascar - onshore and nearshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19861'

Longitude is referenced to the Paris meridian. See Laborde Grid (Greenwich) (projection code 8440) for equivalent in degrees referenced to Greenwich. Within a few hundred km of origin, may be approximated by Oblique Mercator method - see proj code 19911.

Laborde Grid (Greenwich)
------------------------
| Method: Laborde Oblique Mercator
| Extent: Madagascar - onshore and nearshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8440'

See Laborde Grid (projection code 19861) for original definition in grads with respect to the Paris meridian. This is equivalent.

Laborde Grid approximation
--------------------------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B)
| Extent: Madagascar - onshore and nearshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19911'

Longitude is referenced to the Paris meridian. The conversion method is a good approximation (better than 5cm) to original formula (see proj code 19861) within a few hundred km of origin, but farther away the approximation may be no better than 1m.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7749'


Lambert Centre France
---------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: France mainland onshore between 50.5 grads and 53.5 grads North (45°27'N to 48°09'N). Also used over all onshore mainland France.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18092'

Longitude is referenced to the Paris meridian. Replaced in 1972 by Lambert zone II (code 18082).

| Extent: France - Corsica onshore.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18094'

Lambert Nord France
-------------------

| Extent: France mainland onshore north of 53.5 grads North (48°09'N).

.. code-block:: php

Lambert Sud France
------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: France - mainland onshore south of 50.5 grads North (45°27'N).

.. code-block:: php

Lambert zone I
--------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: France mainland onshore north of 53.5 grads North (48°09'N).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18081'

Longitude is referenced to the Paris meridian. Introduced 1972. Replaces Lambert Nord France (code 18091).

Lambert zone II
---------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: France mainland onshore between 50.5 grads and 53.5 grads North (45°27'N to 48°09'N). Also used over all onshore mainland France.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18082'

Longitude is referenced to the Paris meridian. Introduced 1972. Replaces Lambert Centre France (code 18092).

Lambert zone III
----------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: France - mainland onshore south of 50.5 grads North (45°27'N).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18083'

Longitude is referenced to the Paris meridian. Introduced 1972. Replaces Lambert Sud France (code 18093).

| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: France - Corsica onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18084'

Longitude is referenced to the Paris meridian. Introduced 1972. Replaces Lambert Corse (code 18094).

Lisbon 1890 (Lisbon) to Lisbon 1890 (1)
---------------------------------------
| Method: Longitude rotation
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1991'


Lisbon 1890 to ETRS89 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5039'

Parameter values taken from Lisbon 1890 to WGS 84 (1) (tfm code 1986) assuming that ETRS89 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

Lisbon to ETRS89 (3)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5038'

Derived in July 2009 from 119 common stations. Average residual at 833 test points 2.5m, maximum 7m. Info source also gives a Position Vector tfm which is of similar accuracy. Replaces Lisbon to ETRS89 (2) (tfm code 1997).

Lisbon to ETRS89 (4)
--------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6188'

Derived from 1129 common stations in the national geodetic network. Residuals at 130 further test points average 0.09m, maximum 0.30m.

Lisbon to WGS 84 (4)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1988'

Louisiana CS27 North zone
-------------------------

| Extent: United States (USA) - Louisiana - counties of Avoyelles; Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Caldwell; Catahoula; Claiborne; Concordia; De Soto; East Carroll; Franklin; Grant; Jackson; La Salle; Lincoln; Madison; Morehouse; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Rapides; Red River; Richland; Sabine; Tensas; Union; Vernon; Webster; West Carroll; Winn.

Louisiana CS27 Offshore zone
----------------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Louisiana.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::11703'

This projection is NOT used for oil industry purposes - use Louisiana CS27 Offshore zone (proj 11702) on shelf and BLM (proj 15915-16) in deep water protraction areas.

Louisiana CS27 South zone
-------------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Louisiana - counties of Acadia; Allen; Ascension; Assumption; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Cameron; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Evangeline; Iberia; Iberville; Jefferson; Jefferson Davis; Lafayette; LaFourche; Livingston; Orleans; Plaquemines; Pointe Coupee; St Bernard; St Charles; St Helena; St James; St John the Baptist; St Landry; St Martin; St Mary; St Tammany; Tangipahoa; Terrebonne; Vermilion; Washington; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana. Also Gulf of Mexico outer continental shelf (GoM OCS) protraction areas Sabine Pass (LA); West Cameron; East Cameron; Vermilion; South Marsh Island; Eugene Island; Ship Shoal; South Pelto; Bay Marchand; South Timbalier; Grand Isle; West Delta; South Pass; Main Pass; Breton Sound; Chandeleur.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::11702'

Lyon Turin Ferroviaire 2004 (C)
-------------------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP variant B)
| Extent: France and Italy - on or related to the rail route from Lyon to Turin.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9548'

May be emulated using LCC 1SP variant A with false northing of -39367.968 metres at natural origin of 44°22'45"N.

MGI 1901 to Slovenia 1996 (12)
------------------------------

Derived at 479 nodes of Delauney triangulation generated from 1958 control points. Replaces MGI 1901 to Slovenia 1996 (1) (code 3916). May be taken as approximate transformation MGI 1901 to WGS 84 (see code 8688).

MGI to ETRS89 (1)
-----------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Austria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1619'

Same transformation parameters used for MGI to WGS 84 (3) (code 1618). Precision of parameter values in this record were increased effective 16-Dec-2006 (db v6.12): see change record 2006.971.

MGI to ETRS89 (8)
-----------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Austria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9910'

Replaces GIS-Grid (2010) (CT 5891). Not to be used for cadastral purposes because it does not comply with the rules for control network tie-in as per Paragraph 3 of the Land Survey Regulations (Vermessungsverordnung) 2010.

MGI to EVRF2000 Austria height (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (BEV AT)
| Extent: Austria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9277'

Austrian Geoid 2008 (Bessel ellipsoid). Accuracy 5cm (1 sigma). The transformation is implemented in BEV-Transformator. For reversible alternative to this transformation see MGI to MGI + EVRF2000 Austria height (1) (code 9601).

MGI to MGI + EVRF2000 Austria height (1)
----------------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (BEV AT)
| Extent: Austria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9601'

Reversible alternative to MGI to EVRF2000 Austria height (1) (code 9277). Austrian Geoid 2008 (Bessel ellipsoid). Accuracy 5cm (1 sigma). The transformation is implemented in BEV-Transformator.

MGI to WGS 84 (8)
-----------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Austria - Styria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1194'

May be taken as approximate transformation MGI to ETRS89 assuming ETRS89 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation - see tfm code 1024. Information source gives scale as -2.388739 ppm.

MML07-TM
--------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the Midland Mainline rail route from Sheffield to London.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9370'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to MML07-IRF (1) (code 9369), emulates the MML07 Snake projection.

| Extent: Argentina - Tierra del Fuego onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9261'


MMS to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Argentina - Tierra del Fuego onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9262'


MOLDOR11-TM
-----------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the rail route from Manchester via Ordsall Lane and the Hope Valley to Dore Junction.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9879'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to MOLDOR11-IRF (1) (code 9878), emulates the MOLDOR11 Snake projection.

MOLDREF99 to ETRS89 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Moldova.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5584'

MOLDREF is a densification of ETRS89 in Moldova.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15847'

MWC18-TM
--------
| Method: Transverse Mercator

Macao 1920 to WGS 84 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (CF geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - Macao - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8438'

Derived from Macao 2008 to Macao 1920 (1) (code 8435) (reversed) assuming that Macao 2008 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation. Some parameter values differ in the reverse due to the high rotations.

Macao 2008 to Macao 1920 (1)
----------------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (CF geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - Macao - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8435'

Derived at 3 stations in 2008. Accuracy not stated.

Macao 2008 to WGS 84 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: China - Macao - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8436'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that Macao 2008 is equivalent to WGS 84.

| Extent: North Macedonia.

--------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: North Macedonia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9911'

Truncated version of Macedonia Gauss-Kruger, with 4000000m removed from northings.

Madrid 1870 (Madrid) to ED50 (2)
--------------------------------
| Method: Madrid to ED50 polynomial
| Extent: Spain - onshore mainland north of the parallel of approximately 41°58'N from approximately 6°35'W to the meridian of 4°W of Greenwich and then a line from 41°58'N, 4°W through 40°N, 0°E of Greenwich.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1027'

Use in preference to Madrid 1870 (Madrid) to ED50 (1) (code 1026).

Madrid 1870 (Madrid) to ED50 (3)
--------------------------------
| Method: Madrid to ED50 polynomial
| Extent: Spain - onshore mainland south of the parallel of approximately 41°58'N from approximately 6°35'W to the meridian of 4°W of Greenwich and then a line from 41°58'N, 4°W through 40°N, 0°E of Greenwich.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1028'

Use in preference to Madrid 1870 (Madrid) to ED50 (1) (code 1026).

Maine CS2000 Central zone (meters)
----------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United States (USA) - Maine between approximately 69°40'W and 68°25'W. The area is bounded by the following: Beginning at the point determined by the intersection of the Maine State line and the County Line between Aroostook and Somerset Counties, thence northeasterly along the state line to the intersection of the Fort Kent - Frenchville town line, thence southerly along this town line to the intersection with the New Canada Plantation - T17 R5 WELS town line, thence continuing southerly along town lines to the northeast corner of Penobscot County, thence continuing southerly along the Penobscot County line to the intersection of the Woodville - Mattawamkeag town line (being determined by the Penobscot River), thence along the Penobscot River to the Enfield - Lincoln town line, thence southeasterly along the Enfield - Lincoln town line and the Enfield - Lowell town line to the Passadumkeag - Edinburg town line, thence south-southeasterly along town lines to the intersection of the Hancock County line, thence southerly along the county line to the intersection of the Otis - Mariaville town line, thence southerly along the Otis - Mariaville town line to the Ellsworth city line, thence southerly along the Ellsworth city line to the intersection of the Surry - Trenton town line, thence southerly along the easterly town lines of Surry, Blue Hill, Brooklin, Deer Isle, and Stonington to the Knox County line, thence following the Knox County line to the boundary of the State of Maine as determined by Maritime law, thence following the State boundary westerly to the intersection of the Sagadahoc - Lincoln county line, thence northerly along the easterly boundary of the Maine 2000 West Zone, as defined, to the point of beginning.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::11854'

In Maine Department of Transportation and other State agencies replaces CS27 and SPCS83 from 1/1/2001.

Maine CS2000 East zone (meters)
-------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United States (USA) - Maine east of approximately 68°25'W. The area is bounded by the following: Beginning at the point determined by the intersection of the Maine State line and the Fort Kent - Frenchville town line, thence continuing easterly and then southerly along the state line to the boundary of the State of Maine as determined by Maritime law, thence following the State boundary westerly to the intersection of the Knox and Hancock County line, thence northerly along the easterly boundary of the Maine 2000 Central Zone, as defined, to the point of beginning.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::11851'

In Maine Department of Transportation and other State agencies replaces CS27 and SPCS83 from 1/1/2001.

Maine CS2000 West zone (meters)
-------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United States (USA) - Maine west of approximately 69°40'W. The area is bounded by the following: Beginning at the point determined by the intersection of the Maine State line and the County Line between Aroostook and Somerset Counties, thence following the Somerset County line Easterly to the Northwest corner of the Somerset and Piscataquis county line, thence Southerly along this county line to the northeast corner of the Athens town line, thence westerly along the town line between Brighton Plantation and Athens to the westerly corner of Athens, and continuing southerly to the southwest corner of the town of Athens where it meets the Cornville town line, thence westerly along the Cornville - Solon town line to the intersection of the Cornville - Madison town line, thence southerly and westerly following the Madison town line to the intersection of the Norridgewock - Skowhegan town line, thence southerly along the Skowhegan town line to the Fairfield town line, thence easterly along the Fairfield town line to the Clinton town line (being determined by the Kennebec River), thence southerly along the Kennebec River to the Augusta city line, thence easterly along the city line to the Windsor town line, thence southerly along the Augusta - Windsor town line to the northwest corner of the Lincoln County line, thence southerly along the westerly Lincoln county line to the boundary of the State of Maine as determined by Maritime law, thence following the State boundary on the westerly side of the state to the point of beginning.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::11853'

In Maine Department of Transportation and other State agencies replaces CS27 and SPCS83 from 1/1/2001.

Malongo 1987 to RSAO13 (1)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Angola (Cabinda) - offshore; The Democratic Republic of the Congo (Zaire) - offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9906'

Parameter values taken from Malongo 1987 to WGS 84 (2) (code 1557) assuming that RSAO13 is coincident with WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation. Equivalent to concatenation of EPSG:1557 and EPSG:8819.

Malongo 1987 to WGS 84 (2)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Angola (Cabinda) - offshore; The Democratic Republic of the Congo (Zaire) - offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1557'

Derived at station Y in July 1990 through Transit single point positioning using 187 passes by Geodetic Survey Ltd. Replaces Malongo 1987 to WGS 84 (1) (trf code 1330).

| Extent: French Polynesia - Society Islands - Maupiti.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15759'

May be taken as approximate transformation Maupiti 83 to WGS 84 - see code 15771.

Mauritania 1999 to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Mauritania - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15860'

Mauritania 1999 can be considered to be the same as WGS 84 within the accuracy of this transformation.

Mercator 41
-----------

| Extent: Southwestern Pacific Ocean and Southern Ocean areas surrounding New Zealand.

.. code-block:: php

For projects extending within the 12 nautical mile line or onshore, NIWA recommends using NZCS2000 (projection code 17964). For offshore statistical analysis see NIWA Albers (projection code 9190).

Mhast (offshore) to WGS 72BE (1)
--------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Angola (Cabinda) - offshore; The Democratic Republic of the Congo (Zaire) - offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15790'

Derived by Oceaneering for CABGOC in 1979. Mean of parameters derived by single point Transit translocation at 2 stations (Mongo Tando and N'To). Applied to single point Transit translocations at other stations to define Mhast (offshore) coordinates.

Minna to WGS 84 (3)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Nigeria - onshore south.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1754'

Derived at 8 stations across the Niger delta. Used by Shell SPDC throughout southern Nigeria onshore, delta and shallow offshore from 1994 and by Total in OPL246. Sometimes given with parameter values to greater resolution; values here are adequate.

Monte Mario to ETRS89 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Italy - mainland including San Marino and Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1659'

May be taken as approximate transformation Monte Mario to WGS 84 - see code 1660. For more accurate transformations to explicit realizations of ETRS89 see Monte Mario to IGM95 (4) and Monte Mario to RDN2008 (5), CTs 9733 and 9734.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17920'

Replaced Imperial measure circuit in 1972. Replaced by Mount Pleasant 2000 (code 17950) from March 2000.

Mount York 2000
---------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Mount York meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17955'

Replaces Mount York Circuit (code 17925) after 1st March 2000.

Mount York Circuit
------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Mount York meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17925'

Replaced Imperial measure circuit in 1972. Replaced by Mount York 2000 (code 17955) from March 2000.

Moznet to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Mozambique - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1302'

For many purposes Moznet can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84. Accuracy better than 1 metre.

N60 height to EVRF2000 height (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: Finland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5432'

Determined at 66 points. RMS residual 0.003m, maximum residual 0.009m. The N60 vertical reference surface is above the EVRF2000 vertical reference surface.

NAD27 to NAD83 (4)
------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - onshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon; offshore east coast west of 44°W and north of 40°N.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1313'

Uses NTv2 data files. Replaces NTv1 (transformation code 1312) except in Quebec. Input expects longitudes to be positive west; EPSG GeogCRS NAD27 (code 4267) and (code 4269) have longitudes positive east. May be used as tfm to WGS 84 - see code 1693.

NAD27 to NAD83 (6)
------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Quebec.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1573'

Also distributed with file name QUE27-83.gsb. Replaces NAD27 to NAD83 (5) (code 1462). Uses NT method which expects longitudes positive west; EPSG GeogCRSs NAD27 (code 4267) and NAD83 (code 4269) have longitudes positive east.

NAD27 to NAD83 (7)
------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (2D)
| Extent: United States (USA) - CONUS onshore - Alabama; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming. US Gulf of Mexico offshore continental shelf (GoM OCS).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8555'

NADCON5 method expects longitudes 0-360°; source and target CRS longitudes in range ±180°. Accuracy at 67% confidence level is 0.15m onshore, 1m nearshore and undetermined farther offshore. For application in Gulf of Mexico refer to IOGP report 373-26.

NAD27 to NAD83 (8)
------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (2D)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Alaska.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8549'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°. Accuracy at 67% confidence level is 0.5m onshore, 5m nearshore and undetermined farther offshore.

NAD27 to NAD83 (9)
------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Saskatchewan.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9111'


NAD27 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (1)
--------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Quebec.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9239'

Uses NT method which expects longitudes positive west; EPSG GeogCRSs NAD27 (code 4267) and NAD83(CSRS) (code 4617) have longitudes positive east. Can be taken as an approximate transformation NAD27 to WGS 84 - see code 1692.

NAD27 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (2)
--------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Saskatchewan.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9886'

Can be taken as an approximate transformation NAD27 to WGS 84 - see code 1703.

NAD27 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (4)
--------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - New Brunswick.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9238'

Introduced in 2011.  Precision of 20 cm in area covered by the input data set and 40 cm anywhere else, with the exception of the northwest area of the province (near the border with Quebec) where the precision deteriorates to 80 cm.

NAD27 to NAD83(CSRS)v3 (5)
--------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Ontario excluding Toronto.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9107'

Derived through NAD83(CSRS)v3 but within accuracy of transformation may be assumed to apply to any version. For Toronto use NAD27 to NAD83(CSRS) (6) (CT code 9108).

NAD27 to NAD83(CSRS)v3 (6)
--------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Ontario - Toronto.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9108'

Derived through NAD83(CSRS)v3 but within accuracy of transformation may be assumed to apply to any version. For Ontario excluding Toronto use NAD27 to NAD83(CSRS) (5) (CT code 9107).

NAD83 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: North America - onshore and offshore: Canada - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon. .. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1188'

Derived at 354 stations. Accuracy 2m in each axis.

NAD83 to WGS 84 (2)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Alaska - Aleutian Islands onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1251'

Derived at 4 stations. Accuracy 5m, 2m and 5m in X, Y and Z axes.

| Extent: United States (USA) - Hawaii - main islands onshore and offshore.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1252'

NAD83 to WGS 84 (6)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Quebec.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1696'

Parameter file is from NAD83 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (1) (code 9241) assuming that NAD83(CSRS)v2 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation. Also distributed with file name NAD83-98.gsb.

NAD83 to WGS 84 (7)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Saskatchewan.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1697'

Parameter file is from NAD83 to NAD83(CSRS)v2 (2) (code 9887) assuming that NAD83(CSRS)v2 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

NAD83 to WGS 84 (8)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Canada - Alberta.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1702'

Parameter file is from NAD83 to NAD83(CSRS)v4 (3) (code 9244) assuming that NAD83(CSRS)v4 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation. This file AB_CSRS.DAC will need to be renamed to AB_CSRS.gsb to run in some software.

----------------------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Alaska.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9596'

Reversible alternative to NAD83(2011) to NAVD88 height (2) (code 6327).

----------------------------------------------

| Extent: United States (USA) - CONUS onshore - Alabama; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9595'

Reversible alternative to NAD83(2011) to NAVD88 height (3) (code 9229). Uses Geoid18 hybrid model. Replaces 12B model. See information source for further information.

NAD83(2011) to NAVD88 height (2)
--------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Alaska.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6327'

Uses Geoid12B hybrid model. Renamed from Geoid12A but with no data changes. See information source for further information. For reversible alternative to this transformation see NAD83(2011) to NAD83(2011) + NAVD88 height (2) (code 9596).

--------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: United States (USA) - CONUS onshore - Alabama; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming.

Uses Geoid18 hybrid model. Replaces 12B model. See information source for further information. For reversible alternative to this transformation see NAD83(2011) to NAD83(2011) + NAVD88 height (3) (code 9595).
