NAD83(2011) to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Puerto Rico - onshore and offshore. United States (USA) onshore and offshore - Alabama; Alaska; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming. US Virgin Islands - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9774'

For many purposes NAD83(2011) can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84. This approximation ignores the ~2.2m offset of NAD83 from the geocentre, the low accuracy of the WGS 84 ensemble and the application of tectonic plate motion to WGS 84 data.

NAD83(CSRS) to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1842'

For many purposes NAD83(CSRS) can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84.

NAD83(CSRS) to WGS 84 (2)
-------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1946'

Approximation derived from tfm code 6864 ignoring time-dependent parameters and assuming ITRF96(1997.0) and WGS 84 can be considered the same within the accuracy of the transformation.

NAD83(CSRS)v2 to CGVD2013a(1997) height (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::10112'

Applies same geoid model as NAD83(CSRS)v3 to CGVD2013a(1997) height (1), code 10111.

NAD83(CSRS)v2 to CGVD28 height (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba south of 57°N; New Brunswick; Northwest Territories south west of a line between 60°N, 110°W and the coast at 132°W; Nova Scotia; Ontario south of 52°N; Prince Edward Island; Quebec - mainland west of 66°W and south of 55°N; Saskatchewan south of 55°N; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9984'

Valid at epoch 1997.0. Hybrid geoid model. A provisional grid was derived through NAD83(CSRS98) (= NAD83(CSRS)v2) and used HT1 software. This grid is an update derived through NAD83(CSRS)v3, see CT code 9983. It is used in HT2 software.

NAD83(CSRS)v2 to NAD83(CORS96) (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Time-specific Position Vector transform (geocen)
| Extent: North America - onshore and offshore: Canada - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon. Puerto Rico. United States (USA) - Alabama; Alaska; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming. US Virgin Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9126'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Source and target CRSs defined from ITRF96 by common transformations (codes 6864 and 8259). 6864 defines CORS96 from 1st January 1997 to 31st December 1999.

NAD83(CSRS)v3 to CGVD2013a(1997) height (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::10111'

Defines CGVD2013a(1997) height. For reversible alternative see NAD83(CSRS)v3 to NAD83(CSRS)v3 + CGVD2013a(1997) height (1) (code 10129).

NAD83(CSRS)v3 to CGVD28 height (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba south of 57°N; New Brunswick; Northwest Territories south west of a line between 60°N, 110°W and the coast at 132°W; Nova Scotia; Ontario south of 52°N; Prince Edward Island; Quebec - mainland west of 66°W and south of 55°N; Saskatchewan south of 55°N; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9983'

Valid at epoch 1997.0. Hybrid geoid derived from CGG2000 gravimetric geoid fitted to 1926 benchmarks with CGVD28 and NAD83(CSRS)v3 heights. On publication in 2019 of models valid at other epochs, file renamed from "HT2_0.byn"; no change to file contents.

----------------------------------

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9985'

Valid at epoch 2002.0. Hybrid geoid model, grid derived at epoch 1997.0 through NAD83(CSRS)v3 (CT code 9983) and then modified to include correction for propagation of height between 1997.0 and 2002.0 derived from the Canada velocity grid v7.0.

NAD83(CSRS)v6 to CGVD2013a(2010) height (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (NRCan byn)
| Extent: Canada - onshore and offshore - Alberta; British Columbia; Manitoba; New Brunswick; Newfoundland and Labrador; Northwest Territories; Nova Scotia; Nunavut; Ontario; Prince Edward Island; Quebec; Saskatchewan; Yukon.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9247'

Defines CGVD2013 heights. Because CSRS ellipsoidal heights are affected by glacial isostatic adjustment, CGVD2013 heights also change with time. For reversible alternative see NAD83(CSRS)v6 to NAD83(CSRS)v6 + CGVD2013a(2010) height (1) (code 9644).

NAD83(FBN) to NAD83(MA11) (1)

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8866'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; EPSG source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°.

NAD83(HARN) to NAD83(PA11) (1)
------------------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (3D)

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8661'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; EPSG source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°.

NAD83(HARN) to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: American Samoa - onshore - Tutuila, Aunu'u, Ofu, Olesega, Ta'u and Rose islands. Guam - onshore. Northern Mariana Islands - onshore. Puerto Rico - onshore. United States (USA) - onshore Alabama, Alaska, Arizona, Arkansas, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Georgia, Hawaii, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, North Carolina, North Dakota, Ohio, Oklahoma, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, South Carolina, South Dakota, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Vermont, Virginia, Washington, West Virginia, Wisconsin and Wyoming; offshore Gulf of Mexico continental shelf (GoM OCS). US Virgin Islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1580'

For many purposes NAD83(HARN) can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84.

NAD83(HARN) to WGS 84 (3)
-------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United States (USA) - CONUS onshore - Alabama; Arizona; Arkansas; California; Colorado; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Idaho; Illinois; Indiana; Iowa; Kansas; Kentucky; Louisiana; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; Nevada; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New Mexico; New York; North Carolina; North Dakota; Ohio; Oklahoma; Oregon; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Utah; Vermont; Virginia; Washington; West Virginia; Wisconsin; Wyoming.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1901'

Approximation derived from tfm code 6864 ignoring time-dependent parameters and assuming ITRF96(1997.0) and WGS 84, plus NAD83(CORS96) and NAD83(HARN), can be considered the same within the accuracy of the tfm. In USA only replaces tfm code 1900.

NAD83(MA11) to GUVD04 height (1)
--------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: Guam - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7648'

Uses Geoid12B hybrid model. See information source for further information. For reversible alternative to this transformation see NAD83(MA11) to NAD83(MA11) + GUVD04 height (1) (code 9624).

NAD83(MA11) to NAD83(MA11) + GUVD04 height (1)

| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: Guam - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9624'

Reversible alternative to NAD83(MA11) to GUVD04 height (1) (code 7648). Uses Geoid12B hybrid model. See information source for further information.

NGVD29 height (m) to NAVD88 height (1)
--------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset by Grid Interpolation (gtx)
| Extent: United States (USA) - CONUS west of 107°W - onshore - Arizona; California; Colorado; Idaho; Montana; Nevada; New Mexico; Oregon; Utah; Washington; Wyoming.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7969'

In this area the NGVD29 vertical reference surface is approximately 0.6 to 1.6m below the NAVD88 datum surface. Interpolation within the gridded data file may be made using either NAD27 or any of the realizations of NAD83 applicable to US conus.

NGVD29 height (m) to NAVD88 height (2)
--------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset by Grid Interpolation (gtx)
| Extent: United States (USA) - CONUS between 89°W and 107°W - onshore - Arkansas; Colorado; Illinois; Iowa; Kansas; Louisiana; Michigan; Minnesota; Mississippi; Missouri; Montana; Nebraska; New Mexico; North Dakota; Oklahoma; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Wisconsin; Wyoming.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7970'

In the SE of this area the NGVD29 surface is 0 to 0.1m above the NAVD88 surface; in the W it is 0.6 to 0.9m below the NAVD88 surface. Interpolation in the data file may be made using either NAD27 or any of the NAD83 realizations applicable to US conus.

NGVD29 height (m) to NAVD88 height (3)
--------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset by Grid Interpolation (gtx)
| Extent: United States (USA) - CONUS east of 89°W - onshore - Alabama; Connecticut; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; llinois; Indiana; Kentucky; Maine; Maryland; Massachusetts; Michigan; Mississippi; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New York; North Carolina; Ohio; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; Tennessee; Vermont; Virginia; West Virginia; Wisconsin.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7971'

In this area the NGVD29 vertical reference surface is approximately 0 to 0.5m above the NAVD88 surface. Interpolation within the gridded data file may be made using either NAD27 or any of the realisations of NAD83 applicable to US conus.

NTF to RGF93 v1 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translation by Grid Interpolation (IGN)
| Extent: France - onshore - mainland and Corsica.

NTF to RGF93 v2 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translation by Grid Interpolation (IGN)
| Extent: France - onshore - mainland and Corsica.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9888'

Parameter file is from NTF to RGF93 v1 (code 9327), assuming that RGF93 v1 is equivalent to RGF93 v2 within the accuracy of the transformation. May be emulated using NTv2 method - see CT code 9890.

| Extent: France - onshore - mainland and Corsica.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9889'

Parameter file is from NTF to RGF93 v1 (code 9327), assuming that RGF93 v1 is equivalent to RGF93 v2b within the accuracy of the transformation. May be emulated using NTv2 method - see CT code 9891.

NZGD2000 to NZVD2009 height (2)
-------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: New Zealand - onshore and offshore. Includes Antipodes Islands, Auckland Islands, Bounty Islands, Chatham Islands, Cambell Island, Kermadec Islands, Raoul Island and Snares Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9325'

Defines NZVD2009 vertical datum (datum code 1039, CRS code 4440). Supersedes NZGD2000 to NZVD2009 height (1) (code 4459) after change of grid file format. For reversible alternative to this CT see NZGD2000 to NZGD2000 + NZVD2009 height (2) (code 9627).

-------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (gtx)
| Extent: New Zealand - onshore and offshore. Includes Antipodes Islands, Auckland Islands, Bounty Islands, Chatham Islands, Cambell Island, Kermadec Islands, Raoul Island and Snares Islands.

NZVD2016 height to Dunedin 1958 height (2)
------------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset by Grid Interpolation (gtx)
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - between approximately 44°S and 46°S - Dunedin vertical CRS area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9314'

Derived at 197 control points. Mean offset 0.326m, standard deviation 0.043m, maximum difference from mean 0.152m. Supersedes NZVD2016 height to Dunedin 1958 height (1) (code 7862) after change of grid file format.

| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Dunedin-Bluff vertical CRS area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9315'

Derived at 205 control points. Mean offset 0.254m, standard deviation 0.039m, maximum difference from mean 0.11m. Supersedes NZVD2016 height to Dunedin-Bluff 1960 height (1) (code 7863) after change of grid file format.

Nahrwan 1934 to WGS 84 (6)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iraq - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7033'

Derived by concatenation of parameter values published by IGN Paris from Nahrwan 1934 to WGS 72 at the Nahrwan SE Base station near Baghdad with DMA WGS 72 to WGS 84 parameter values. For more accurate transformation away from origin see codes 7008-7032.

Nahrwan 1967 to WGS 84 (10)
---------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United Arab Emirates (UAE) - Dubai municipality.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15953'

Used by Dubai Municipality before 1994.

Nahrwan 1967 to WGS 84 (12)
---------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United Arab Emirates (UAE) - Abu Dhabi onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6999'

Derived in October 2013 at four control points of the ADCO CRF and evaluated at four others. Estimated horizontal accuracy of 0.14 m at the 95% confidence level.

Nahrwan 1967 to WGS 84 (2)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Saudi Arabia - onshore Arabian Gulf coastal area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1190'

Derived at 3 stations. Accuracy 20m in each axis.

Nahrwan 1967 to WGS 84 (3)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United Arab Emirates (UAE) - onshore and offshore. Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, Umm al Qaywayn, Al Fujairah, Ras al Khaymah.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1191'

Derived at 2 stations. Accuracy 25m in each axis.

Nahrwan 1967 to WGS 84 (4)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United Arab Emirates (UAE) - Abu Dhabi offshore - Abu al Bu Khoosh.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1531'

Parameter values adopted by Total are mean of those derived by Oceonics and Geoid through ties at platform AK1 to 4 IGS stations in March 1995.

Naparima 1955 to WGS 84 (2)
---------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Trinidad and Tobago - Trinidad - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1555'

Derived in 1989 by ONI for Amoco.

Naparima 1972 to WGS 84 (3)
---------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Trinidad and Tobago - Tobago - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1307'

DMA does not differentiate between Naparima 1955 (Trinidad) and Naparima 1972 (Tobago). Consequently for Trinidad IOGP has duplicated this transformation as Naparima 1955 to WGS 84 (3) - see code 1556.

| Extent: Norway - onshore - between 10°E and 11°E.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5140'

UTM used as official map projection. This is an official alternative for construction projects.

Nouakchott 1965 to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Mauritania - Nouakchutt.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15709'

Derived by IGN in 1992 at 7 stations within Nouakchott city.

Noumea Lambert
--------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: New Caledonia - Grande Terre - Noumea district.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19873'

Applications unable to define parameter values in decimal seconds should use the Noumea Lambert 2 projection which gives the same conversion results.

Noumea Lambert 2
----------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: New Caledonia - Grande Terre - Noumea district.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19874'

Variant of Noumea Lambert (proj code 19873) defined for applications unable to define parameter values in decimal seconds. Gives same conversion results.

ODN height to EVRF2000 height (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - Great Britain onshore - England and Wales - mainland; Scotland - mainland and Inner Hebrides.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::4651'

Determined at 31 points. RMS residual 0.026m, maximum residual 0.080m.

ODN height to EVRF2019 mean-tide height (2)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - Great Britain onshore - England and Wales - mainland; Scotland - mainland and Inner Hebrides.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9562'

Determined at Channel Tunnel portal.

ONGD14 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geocentric domain)
| Extent: Oman - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7377'

Translations given by information source in mm. Derived at 20 stations, RMS 0.0313m in northing, 0.0377m in easting and 0.0678m in height.

ONGD17 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geocentric domain)
| Extent: Oman - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9298'


OSGB36 to WGS 84 (6)
--------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - Great Britain - England and Wales onshore, Scotland onshore and Western Isles nearshore including Sea of the Hebrides and The Minch; Isle of Man onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1314'

Commonly referred to as the "OSGB Petroleum transformation". For a more accurate transformation see ETRS89 to OSGB36 / British National Grid (3) (code 7953).

OSNI 1952 to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - Northern Ireland (Ulster) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1955'

Parameter values from TM75 to ETRS89 (2) (code 1953). Assumes each pair of (i) OSNI 1952 and TM75, and (ii) ETRS89 and WGS 84, can be considered the same to within the accuracy of the transformation.

Observatario to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Mozambique - south.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6900'

Derived at 3 stations. Accuracy 10m in each axis.

Observation Point 2000
----------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Observation Point meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17956'

Replaces Observation Point Circuit (code 17926) after 1st March 2000.

Observation Point Circuit
-------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Observation Point meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17926'

Replaced Imperial measure circuit in 1972. Replaced by Observation Point 2000 (code 17956) from March 2000.

Old Hawaiian to NAD83 (2)
-------------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (2D)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Hawaii - main islands onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8561'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; EPSG source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°.

Old Hawaiian to WGS 84 (3)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Hawaii - main islands onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15824'

Derived at 15 satellite stations. Accuracy +/- 25m in X axis, +/- 20m in Y and Z axes.

Ostend height to EVRF2000 height (1)
------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5198'

Determined at 4 points. RMS residual 0.002m, maximum residual 0.002m.

Ostend height to EVRF2007 height (1)
------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Belgium - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5199'

Determined at 4 points. RMS residual 0.002m, maximum residual 0.002m.

PD/83 to ETRS89 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - Thuringen.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15867'

Derived at 10 points of the German GPS Network DREF.

PN68 to WGS 84 (1)
------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Spain - Canary Islands onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9743'

Determined at 1 satellite station. Accuracy +/- 25m in each axis. Unclear from information source whether the source CRS is PN68 or PN84 - see also CT code 15815. Given the accuracy, can be considered to apply to either.

PN84 to WGS 84 (1)
------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Spain - Canary Islands - El Hierro, La Gomera, La Palma and Tenerife - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15815'

Determined at 1 satellite station. Accuracy +/- 25m in each axis. Unclear from information source whether the source CRS is PN68 or PN84 - see also CT code 9743. Given the accuracy, can be considered to apply to either.

PNG94 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Papua New Guinea - onshore and offshore. Includes Bismark archipelago, Louisade archipelago, Admiralty Islands, d'Entrecasteaux Islands, northern Solomon Islands, Trobriand Islands, New Britain, New Ireland, Woodlark, and associated islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5553'

Exact in 1994 but due to significant and variable tectonic activity in PNG, in 2011 PNG94 and WGS 84 differ generally by 2m but in areas of significant tectonic activity differences can exceed 9m.

POSGAR 2007 to POSGAR 2007 + SRVN16 height (1)
----------------------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (Gravsoft)
| Extent: Argentina - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9621'

Reversible alternative to POSGAR 2007 to SRVN16 height (1) (code 9256). Uses geoid model Ar16. See information source for more information.

POSGAR 2007 to SIRGAS 2000 (1)
------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Argentina - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5497'


POSGAR 2007 to SRVN16 height (1)
--------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (Gravsoft)
| Extent: Argentina - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9256'

Uses geoid model Ar16. See information source for more information. For reversible alternative to this transformation see POSGAR 2007 to POSGAR 2007 + SRVN16 height (1) (code 9621).

POSGAR 2007 to WGS 84 (2)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Argentina - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9264'

Derived as average at all points common between the POSGAR 94 and POSGAR 2007 networks. POSGAR 94 was adjusted to the WGS 84 coordinates of 20 stations in March to May 1994. Accuracy 0.1m in 1994 + 1.5cm per year.

POSGAR 94 to WGS 84 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Argentina - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1210'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that POSGAR 94 is equivalent to WGS 84.

POSGAR 98 to SIRGAS 1995 (1)

| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Argentina - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1774'


POSGAR 98 to WGS 84 (1)

| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Argentina - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1773'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that POSGAR 98 is equivalent to WGS 84.

PRS92 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Philippines - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15708'

Derived during GPS campaign which established PRS92 coordinates at 330 first order stations.

PSAD56 to REGVEN (1)
--------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (CF geog2D domain)
| Extent: Venezuela - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1769'

May be taken as transformation to WGS 84 - see PSAD56 to WGS 84 (13) (code 1095).

Also used as a transformation from PSAD56 to other realizations of SIRGAS-Chile and to WGS 84 - see code 6973.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Bolivia; Chile - onshore north of 43°30'S; Ecuador - mainland onshore; Guyana - onshore; Peru - onshore; Venezuela - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1201'

Derived at 63 stations. Accuracy 17m, 27m and 27m in X, Y and Z axes. DMA also lists Colombia as area of applicability but PSAD56 is not used in that country.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (10)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Bolivia - Madidi.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1582'

Derived May 1995 by Geoid for Total. OSU91A geoid model used.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (11)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Bolivia - Block 20.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1583'

Derived July 1997 by Geoid from data recorded by UGA for Total. OSU91A geoid model used.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (12)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Brazil - offshore shelf - Amazon cone.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1811'

Used by Petrobras for shelf operations.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (13)
---------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (CF geog2D domain)
| Extent: Venezuela - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1095'

Parameter values are from PSAD56 to REGVEN (1) (code 1769) assuming that REGVEN is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (14)
---------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Ecuador - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::3990'

Parameter values from PSAD56 to SIRGAS 1995 (1) (code 3971). Assumes SIRGAS 1995 and WGS 84 can be considered the same to within the accuracy of the transformation.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (15)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Chile - onshore north of 26°S.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6971'

Derived at 5 stations. Accuracy 10m in each axis. Replaces PSAD56 to WGS 84 (3) (code 1203). Also used as a transformation from PSAD56 to SIRGAS-Chile - see code 6949.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (16)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Chile - onshore between 26°S and 36°S.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6972'

Derived at 7 stations. Accuracy 10m in each axis. Also used as a transformation from PSAD56 to SIRGAS-Chile - see code 6950.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (17)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Chile - onshore between 36°S and 43°30'S.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6973'

Derived at 6 stations. Accuracy 10m in each axis. Replaces PSAD56 to WGS 84 (4) (code 1204). Info source gives S limit as 44°S but Chilean IGM states that PSAD56 limit is 43°30'S. Also used as a transformation from PSAD56 to SIRGAS-Chile - see code 6951.

--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Bolivia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1202'

Derived at 5 stations. Accuracy 5m, 11m and 14m in X, Y and Z axes.

PSAD56 to WGS 84 (5)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Colombia - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1205'

Derived at 4 stations. Accuracy 15m in each axis. Note that although the PSAD56 network included Colombia the CRS is not used there: see Bogota 1975 (CRS code 4218).

| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Ecuador - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

Derived at 11 stations. Accuracy 3m, 5m and 3m in X, Y and Z axes.

PSD93 to WGS 72 (1)

Residuals 1.2m at 67% probability level.

PSD93 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)

Residuals 0.5m at 67% probability level. Replaced PSD93 to WGS 84 (2) (code 8581) in 1997.

PTRA08 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - Azores and Madeira island groups and surrounding EEZ - Flores, Corvo; Graciosa, Terceira, Sao Jorge, Pico, Faial; Sao Miguel, Santa Maria; Madeira, Porto Santo, Desertas; Selvagens.

.. code-block:: php

PZ-90 to WGS 84 (2)

Mandated for use in Russia by GosStandard of Russia Decree #327 of August 9, 2001. Republished but with one significant figure less precision to parameter values in GOST R 51794-2008 of December 18 2008.

Palestine 1923 to Israel 1993 (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1071'

For more accurate transformation contact Survey of Israel.

Palestine 1923 to WGS 84 (1)
----------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1074'

Accuracy: 1m to north and 5m to south of east-west line through Beersheba (31°15'N). Not recognised by Survey of Israel. See Palestine 1923 to WGS 84 (2) (code 8650).

Palestine Belt
--------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Jordan; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18202'

Replaces Palestine Grid (code 18201). See also Israeli CS (proj code 18203) which has identical parameter values: the difference in coordinates between the Palestine Belt and the Israeli CS caused by their different methods is under 2m within Israel.

Palestine Grid
--------------
| Method: Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Jordan; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18201'

Replaced (i) in Israel by Israeli CS (proj code 18203) which adds 1 million to FN; (ii) for AMS by Palestine Belt (code18202) which adds 1 million to FN and changes method to TM. Also encountered as a TM projection without change to FN (see code 7141).

Palestine Grid modified
-----------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Jordan; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7141'

Modification of Palestine Grid (proj 18201) using TM rather than Cassini projection method. The difference in coordinates caused by change of method is under 2m within Israel but can be over 200m in eastern Jordan.

Pampa del Castillo to WGS 84 (2)

| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9259'

Derived through common coordinates at 22 stations. Used by YPF throughout the Golfo San Jorge basin.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18308'

See Poland CS92 (code 18300) for mapping at 1:10,000 and smaller scales.

Poland CS92
-----------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Poland - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18300'

See Poland CS2000 zones (codes 18305-08) for cadastral survey and mapping at larger scales.

Poolbeg height (m) to Belfast height (1)
----------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - Northern Ireland (Ulster) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7966'

Poolbeg vertical reference surface is 2.7m below Belfast surface. Nominal accuracy 0.1m but transformations are subject to localised anomalies.

Poolbeg height (m) to Malin Head height (1)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: Ireland - onshore. United Kingdom (UK) - Northern Ireland (Ulster) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7964'

Poolbeg vertical reference surface is 2.7m below Malin Head surface. Nominal accuracy 0.1m but transformations are subject to localised anomalies.

Port Hedland Grid 2020

| Extent: Australia - Western Australia - Port Hedland area onshore.

Porto Santo 1995 to PTRA08 (1)
------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - Madeira, Porto Santo and Desertas islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5021'

Derived at 34 points in May 2009. Residuals at 25 test points within 0.5m horizontal and 2m vertical. Info source also provides a Position Vector tfm of similar accuracy. See codes 5022 and 5023 for preferred tfms for islands of Porto Santo and Maderia.

Porto Santo 1995 to PTRA08 (2)
------------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - Madeira island onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5022'

Derived at 22 points in May 2009. Residuals at 17 test points within 0.1m horizontal and 1m vertical. Info source also provides a less accurate 3-parameter transformation (dX=-503.174m, dY=-247.255m, dZ=312.316m).

Porto Santo 1995 to PTRA08 (3)
------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - Porto Santo island (Madeira archipelago) onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5023'

Derived at 14 points in May 2009. Residuals at 6 test points within 0.1m horizontal and 0.2m vertical. Info source also provides a 7-parameter Position Vector transformation of similar accuracy.

Porto Santo 1995 to WGS 84 (2)
------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - Madeira and Porto Santo islands onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1966'

Derived at Forte de Sao Tiago.

| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Portugal - Madeira and Porto Santo islands onshore.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1967'

Portugal Bonne
--------------
| Method: Bonne (South Orientated)
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19979'

Longitude is referenced to the Lisbon meridian. Replaced by definition using Greenwich meridian, proj code 5019.

Portugal Bonne New
------------------
| Method: Bonne (South Orientated)
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5019'

Replaces original definition referenced to Lisbon meridian (proj code 19979).

Portugual TM06

| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19853'

Applied to ETRS89.

Portuguese Grid
---------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19969'

Original transformation by Gauss-Kruger formula. Longitude is referenced to the Lisbon meridian. Replaced by definition using Greenwich meridian, proj code 5020.

Portuguese Grid New
-------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Portugal - mainland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5020'

Replaces original definition referenced to Lisbon meridian (proj code 19969).

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19936'

Poverty Bay 2000
----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - North Island - Poverty Bay meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17933'

Replaces Poverty Bay Circuit (code 17903) after 1st March 2000.

Poverty Bay Circuit
-------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - North Island - Poverty Bay meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17903'

Replaced Imperial measure circuit in 1972. Replaced by Poverty Bay 2000 (code 17933) from March 2000.

Prince Edward Isl. Stereographic (NAD83)
----------------------------------------
| Method: Oblique Stereographic
| Extent: Canada - Prince Edward Island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19960'

False Easting and False Northing changed from values used with ATS77 (which were FE=700000m; FN=400000m) to these new values when used with NAD83 (CSRS).  New values are FE=400000m; FN=800000m; adopted in 2000.

Prince Edward Island Stereographic (ATS77)
------------------------------------------
| Method: Oblique Stereographic
| Extent: Canada - Prince Edward Island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19933'

In use from 1979. To be phased out in late 1990's.

Puerto Rico to NAD83 (2)
------------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (2D)
| Extent: Puerto Rico and US Virgin Islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8668'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; EPSG source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1893'

Derived at 11 stations. Accuracy 3m in each axis.

Pulkovo 1942 to PZ-90 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Armenia; Azerbaijan; Belarus; Estonia - onshore; Georgia - onshore; Kazakhstan; Kyrgyzstan; Latvia - onshore; Lithuania - onshore; Moldova; Russian Federation - onshore; Tajikistan; Turkmenistan; Ukraine - onshore; Uzbekistan.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15844'

Derived through Glonass at 30 stations throughout USSR - Former Soviet Union (FSU). Mandated for use in Russia by GosStandard of Russia Decree #327 of August 9, 2001.

Pulkovo 1942 to UCS-2000 (1)
----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Ukraine - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5586'

UCS-2000 is defined to be approximately consistent with Pulkovo 1942 and this transformation's accuracy is due to deformation of the Pulkovo system across Ukranian territory.

Pulkovo 1942 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Russian Federation - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1254'

Accuracy estimate not available.

Pulkovo 1942 to WGS 84 (10)
---------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Kazakhstan - Caspian Sea.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1303'

Mean of 13 stations along entire Kazak coastline.

| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Estonia - onshore.

Pulkovo 1942 to WGS 84 (14)
---------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Azerbaijan (including Caspian) and Georgia onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1808'

Mean of 3 stations in western Georgia, 4 stations in eastern Georgia and 4 stations in eastern Azerbaijan. Derived for use on AIOC early oil western export pipeline, but adopted for all AIOC work replacing the 1995 AIOC transformation (code 1807).

Pulkovo 1942 to WGS 84 (15)
---------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Azerbaijan - coastal area Baku to Astara.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1809'

Parameter values calculated by Elf Exploration and Production based on geodetic survey carried out by Azerbaijan State Committee for Geodesy and Cartography.

Pulkovo 1942 to WGS 84 (16)
---------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Armenia; Azerbaijan; Belarus; Estonia - onshore; Georgia - onshore; Kazakhstan; Kyrgyzstan; Latvia - onshore; Lithuania - onshore; Moldova; Russian Federation - onshore; Tajikistan; Turkmenistan; Ukraine - onshore; Uzbekistan.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15865'

Derived via PZ-90 at 30 stations throughout USSR (Former Soviet Union, FSU) through concatenation of Pulkovo 1942 to PZ-90 (1) (tfm code 15844) and PZ-90 to WGS 84 (1) (tfm code 15843).

Pulkovo 1942 to WGS 84 (20)
---------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Russian Federation - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5044'

Derived through concatenation of Pulkovo 1942 to PZ-90.02 to WGS 84. Replaces Pulkovo 1942 to WGS 84 (17) (code 1267).

| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Estonia - onshore.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6899'

Derived at 19 stations. Accuracy 2m, 3m and 3m in X, Y and Z axes.

Pulkovo 1942(58) to Albanian 1987 (1)
-------------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Albania - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7836'

Albanian 1987 may be considered to be approximately equivalent to Pulkovo 1942(58) at the +/- 1m level.

Pulkovo 1942(58) to ETRS89 (1)
------------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Poland - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1644'

May be taken as approximate transformation Pulkovo 1942(58) to WGS 84 - see code 1645. Parameter values given to greater precision but to no better accuracy in GUGiK Technical Instruction G-2, Warsaw 2001.

Pulkovo 1942(58) to ETRS89 (4)
------------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Romania - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15994'

Replaces S-42 to ETRS89 (3) (tfm code 15993). Consistent with Transdat v3.0 to better than 0.5m. May be taken as approximate transformation Pulkovo 1942(58) to WGS 84 - see code 15995.

Pulkovo 1942(83) to BGS2005 (1)
-------------------------------
| Method: Molodensky-Badekas (PV geog2D domain)
| Extent: Bulgaria - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7806'

Official transformation for converting existing geodetic and cartographic materials to BGS2005. Older CRSs (CS30, CS50, CS70) must first be transformed to Pulkovo 1942(83) before this transformation is applied.

Pulkovo 1942(83) to ETRS89 (2)
------------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - states of former East Germany - Berlin, Brandenburg; Mecklenburg-Vorpommern; Sachsen; Sachsen-Anhalt; Thuringen.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1775'

Derived at 35 points of the German GPS Network DREF. From 2001 replaces Pulkovo 1942(83) to ETRS89 (1) (code 1674) within Mecklenburg-Vorpommern and Sachsen-Anhalt. From 2009 replaces tfm 1674 in all other states of former East Germany.

| Extent: Qatar - onshore.

RD/83 to ETRS89 (1)
-------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Germany - Sachsen.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15868'

Derived in 2001 at 31 points of the German GPS Network DREF in former East Germany. Although for high accuracy limited to Saxony, may be taken as approximate transformation between DHDN and WGS 84 for all former East German states - see code 15869.

RD/83 to ETRS89 (2)
-------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Germany - Sachsen.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6948'

Recommended by Saxony State Spatial Data and Land Survey Corporation for transformations based on official geospatial data of Saxony. Accuracy 3mm within Saxony; within the rest of RD/83 definition area results at least coincide with EPSG CT code15868.

RDN2008 to ETRS89 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Italy - onshore and offshore; San Marino, Vatican City State.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6710'

RDN2008 is the second Italian realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation RDN2008 to WGS 84 - see code 6711.

RGAF09 to Guadeloupe 1988 height (2)
------------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (IGN2009)
| Extent: Guadeloupe - onshore - Basse-Terre and Grande-Terre.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9133'

Replaces RGAF09 to Guadeloupe 1988 height (1) (CT code 5503). Accuracy 0.01-0.05m within onshore areas. For reversible alternative to this transformation see RGAF09 to RGAF09 + Guadeloupe 1988 height (2) (code 9631).

RGAF09 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: French Antilles onshore and offshore - Guadeloupe (including Grande Terre, Basse Terre, Marie Galante, Les Saintes, Iles de la Petite Terre, La Desirade); Martinique; St Barthélemy; St Martin.

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that RGAF09 is equivalent to WGS 84 within the accuracy of the transformation.

RGF93 v1 to ETRS89 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: France - onshore and offshore, mainland and Corsica (France métropolitaine including Corsica).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1591'

RGF93 v1 is a national realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation RGF93 v1 to WGS 84 - see code 1671.

RGF93 v1 to RGF93 v2 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: France - onshore and offshore, mainland and Corsica (France métropolitaine including Corsica).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9882'

Maximum differences are 0.1m in both horizontal and vertical. Distortions in RGF93 v1 are irregular and IGN considers that no systematic transformation to the improved v2 adjustment is possible.

RGF93 v2 to ETRS89 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: France - onshore and offshore, mainland and Corsica (France métropolitaine including Corsica).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9789'

RGF93 v2 is a national realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation RGF93 v2 to WGS 84 - see code 9791.

RGF93 v2 to NGF-IGN78 height (2)
--------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (IGN2009)
| Extent: France - Corsica onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8372'

Replaces ggf97a model [RGF93 v1 to NGF-IGN78 height (1) (code 10002)]. Accuracy at each grid node is given in the geoid model file. For reversible alternative see RGF93 v2 to RGF93 v2 + NGF-IGN78 height (2) (code 9639).

RGF93 v2 to RGF93 v2b
---------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: France - onshore and offshore, mainland and Corsica (France métropolitaine including Corsica).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9788'

Derived at 465 permanent GNSS stations. In use from 2021-01-05.

RGF93 v2b to ETRS89 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: France - onshore and offshore, mainland and Corsica (France métropolitaine including Corsica).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9790'

RGF93 v2b is a national realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation RGF93 v2b to WGS 84 - see CT code 9792.

RGF93 v2b to NGF-IGN69 height (5)
---------------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to GravityRelatedHeight (IGN2009)
| Extent: France - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9876'

Replaces RAF18b geoid model [RGF93 v2 to NGF-IGN69 height (4)]. Accuracy at each grid node is in the geoid model file. Recommended interpolation method is bilinear. For reversible alternative see RGF93 v2b to RGF93 v2b + NGF-IGN69 height (5) (code 9877).

RGF93 v2b to RGF93 v2b + NGF-IGN69 height (5)
---------------------------------------------
| Method: Geog3D to Geog2D+GravityRelatedHeight (IGN2009)
| Extent: France - mainland onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9877'

Reversible alternative to RGF93 v2b to NGF-IGN69 height (5) (CT code 9876). Replaces RGF93 v2b to RGF93 v2b + NGF-IGN69 height (4) (CT code 9787).

RGR92 to Reunion 1947 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Reunion - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1964'

Note: Because of the large rotation about the Y-axis this transformation is not reversible. Errors of up to 0.5m may occur. For the reverse transformation use Piton des Neiges to RGR92 (1) (code 1926).

RGTAAF07 to WGS 84 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: French Southern Territories - onshore and offshore: Amsterdam and St Paul, Crozet, Europa and Kerguelen. Antarctica - Adelie Land coastal area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9770'

For many purposes RGTAAF07 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84. This approximation ignores the low accuracy of the WGS 84 ensemble and the application of tectonic plate motion to WGS 84 data.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9769'

For many purposes RGWF96 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84. This approximation ignores the low accuracy of the WGS 84 ensemble and the application of tectonic plate motion to WGS 84 data.

RH2000 height to EVRF2007 height (1)
------------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Sweden - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5208'

Determined at 3353 points. RMS residual 0.001m, maximum residual 0.004m.

RH70 height to EVRF2000 height (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Sweden - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5430'

Determined at 21 points. RMS residual 0.011m, maximum residual 0.023m. Not recognised by National Land Survey of Sweden. No longer supported by information source.

RT90 to SWEREF99 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Sweden - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1895'

Derived at 165 points in 2001. Also given by EuroGeographics as RT90 to ETRS89 using the Position Vector transformation method. Replaces RT90 to ETRS89 (1) (code 1437). May be taken as approximate transformation RT90 to WGS 84 - see code 1896.

RT90 zone 0 gon emulation
-------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Sweden - communes between approximately 16°55'E and 19°10'E; Gotland. See information source for map.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17342'

This projection embeds an approximation to 0.2m accuracy of the Sweref99 and WGS 84 to RT90 transformations (tfm codes 1895 and 1896).

Rassadiran to WGS 84 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iran - Taheri refinery site.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1512'

Derived in 1998 at Assaluyeh (Taheri refinery) by Geoid for Total. Used only for terminal site for South Pars phases 2 and 3.

Rectified Skew Orthomorphic Borneo Grid (chains)
------------------------------------------------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B)
| Extent: Brunei - onshore and offshore; Malaysia - East Malaysia (Sabah; Sarawak) - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19956'

See 19957 and 19958 for feet and metres versions. If using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A) method (code 9812) FE = FN = 0 chSe. Being replaced by metric version (code 19958).

Rectified Skew Orthomorphic Borneo Grid (feet)
----------------------------------------------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B)
| Extent: Malaysia - East Malaysia (Sabah; Sarawak), onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19957'

See 19956 and 19958 for chains and metres versions. If using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A) method (code 9812) FE = FN = 0 ftSe.  Being replaced by metric version (code 19958).

Rectified Skew Orthomorphic Borneo Grid (metres)
------------------------------------------------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B)
| Extent: Brunei - onshore and offshore; Malaysia - East Malaysia (Sabah; Sarawak) - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19958'

See 19956 and 19957 for chains and feet versions. Uses Sear's 1922 British yard-metre ratio as given by Bomford as 39.370147 inches per metre. If using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A) method (code 9812) FE = FN = 0 m.

Rectified Skew Orthomorphic Malaya Grid (chains)
------------------------------------------------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A)
| Extent: Malaysia - West Malaysia onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19871'

If using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B) method (code 9815), Ec=23505.515 chSe(T), Nc=21992.646 chSe(T).

Rectified Skew Orthomorphic Malaya Grid (metres)
------------------------------------------------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A)
| Extent: Malaysia - West Malaysia onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19872'

Uses metric conversion factor of 0.914398 metres per yard exactly. If using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B) method (code 9815), Ec=472854.710m, Nc=442420.693m.

Rectified Skew Orthomorphic Sarawak LSD (metres)
------------------------------------------------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A)
| Extent: Malaysia - East Malaysia - Sarawak onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19838'

Used by the Sarawak Land and Survey Department. Conversion 19958 but using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A) and with FE increased by 2,000,000 m and FN by 5,000,000 m. If using variant B method (code 9815) FE = 2590476.871 m and FN = 5442857.653 m.

Reunion 1947 to RGR92 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Reunion - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1926'

Note: Because of the large rotation about the Y-axis this transformation is not reversible. Errors of up to 0.5m may occur. For the reverse transformation use RGR92 to Reunion 1947 [alias Piton des Neiges] (1) (code 1964).

| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Iceland - mainland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1994'

S-JTSK (Ferro) to S-JTSK (1)
----------------------------
| Method: Longitude rotation
| Extent: Czechia; Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1884'


S-JTSK [JTSK03] to ETRS89 (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8367'

Derived at 684 points. At the 1mm accuracy level this transformation is not reversible: for reverse see transformation code 8365. May be taken as approximate transformation to WGS 84 - see code 8368.

S-JTSK [JTSK03] to S-JTSK (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8364'

Derived at 684 identical points. Also available as an NTv2 file.

S-JTSK to S-JTSK/05 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Geographic2D offsets
| Extent: Czechia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5241'

S-JTSK/05 is derived from the R05 realisation of ETRS89 and constrained to be coincident with S-JTSK.

S-JTSK to WGS 84 (3)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Czechia; Slovakia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15965'

Derived at 6 stations.

S-JTSK/05 (Ferro) to S-JTSK/05 (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Longitude rotation
| Extent: Czechia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5238'


S-JTSK/05 to ETRS89 (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Czechia.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5226'

Derived through the relationship between the R05 realisation of ETRS89 and the astrogeodetic S-JTSK network. Replaces tfm code 1622. May be taken as approximate transformation S-JTSK to WGS 84 - see code 5227.

SAD69 to SIRGAS 2000 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Brazil - onshore and offshore. Includes Rocas, Fernando de Noronha archipelago, Trindade, Ihlas Martim Vaz and Sao Pedro e Sao Paulo.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15485'

Accuracy generally better than 1m except in Amazon basin where it degenerates to 5m. May be used as CT between SAD69(96) and SIRGAS 2000 and between SAD69 and WGS 84 - see tfm codes 5881 and 5882. Used by Petrobras and ANP throughout Brazil from 1994.

SAD69 to SIRGAS 2000 (2)
------------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Brazil - onshore southeast of a line beginning at the intersection of the 53°W meridian with the northern national boundary then running southwards to 14°S, then westwards to the national boundary.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5528'

For IBGE, in onshore east and south Brazil only, replaces SAD69 to SIRGAS 2000 (1) (tfm code 15485) for pre-1996 data based on the classical geodetic network. May be used as transformation between SAD69 and WGS 84 - see tfm code 5542.

Derived at 84 stations. Accuracy 15m, 6m and 9m in X, Y and Z axes.

SAD69 to WGS 84 (14)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Brazil - onshore and offshore. Includes Rocas, Fernando de Noronha archipelago, Trindade, Ihlas Martim Vaz and Sao Pedro e Sao Paulo.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1877'

Derived by Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE) in 1989 at Chua origin point. In use by Shell throughout Brazil. For use by Petrobras and ANP, replaced by tfm code 5882 from 1994.

SAD69 to WGS 84 (17)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Chile - onshore north of 32°S.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6974'

Derived at 8 stations. Accuracy 2m in each axis. Along with CTs 6975 and 6976, replaces SAD69 to WGS 84 (5) (code 1868). Also used as a CT from SAD69 to SIRGAS-Chile - see code 7448. Note: SAD69 adopted by Chile authorities only south of 43°30'S.

SAD69 to WGS 84 (18)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Chile - onshore between 32°S and 36°S.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6975'

Derived at 6 stations. Accuracy 2m in each axis. Along with CTs 6974 and 6976, replaces SAD69 to WGS 84 (5) (code 1868). Also used as a CT from SAD69 to SIRGAS-Chile - see code 6968. Note: SAD69 adopted by Chile authorities only south of 43°30'S.

SAD69 to WGS 84 (19)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Chile - onshore between 36°S and 43°30'S.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6976'

Derived at 4 stations. Accuracy 4m in each axis. Along with CTs 6974 and 6975, replaces SAD69 to WGS 84 (5) (code 1868). Also used as a CT from SAD69 to SIRGAS-Chile - see code 7449. Note: SAD69 adopted by Chile authorities only south of 43°30'S.

SAD69 to WGS 84 (20)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Chile - Tierra del Fuego onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6977'

Derived at 6 stations. Accuracy 3m, 3m and 4m in X, Y and Z axes. Also used as a transformation from SAD69 to SIRGAS-Chile - see code 6970.  Unlike IGM Chile, NGA extends use of this tfm to all Chile south of 44°S.

SAD69(96) to SIRGAS 2000 (2)
----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Brazil - onshore and offshore. Includes Rocas, Fernando de Noronha archipelago, Trindade, Ihlas Martim Vaz and Sao Pedro e Sao Paulo.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5881'

Parameter values from SAD69 to SIRGAS 2000 (1) (tfm code 15485) assuming that SAD69 and SAD69(96) are equal within the accuracy of the transformation. Used by Petrobras and ANP throughout Brazil from 1994.

SCM22-TM
--------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the Scottish central mainline rail route from Motherwell through Perth and Pitlochry to Inverness.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9971'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to SCM22-IRF (1) (code 9970), emulates the SCM22 Snake projection.

SHGD2015 to Astro DOS 71 (2)
----------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha - St Helena Island - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9226'

Derived at 19 stations, RMS = 6cm. Note: Because of the large rotations about the Y- and Z-axes this transformation is not reversible. For the reverse transformation use Astro DOS 71 to SHGD2015 (2) (code 7895).

SHGD2015 to WGS 84 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha - St Helena Island - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7892'

SHGD2015 is realized by ITRF2008 at epoch 2015.0 and can be considered coincident with WGS 84 at epoch 2015.0 Accuracy 3 cm at 1/1/2015 then degrades by 3 cm/yr from 1/1/2015 depending upon epoch of WGS 84 due to motion of the Nubian Plate

SIGD61 to CIGD11 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Cayman Islands - Little Cayman and Cayman Brac.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6137'

May be taken as approximate transformation SIGD61 to WGS 84 - see code 6143.

SIRGAS 1995 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: South America - onshore and offshore. Ecuador (mainland and Galapagos) - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1581'

Accuracy 1m in each axis.

SIRGAS 2000 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Latin America - Central America and South America - onshore and offshore. Brazil - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15894'

Approximation at the +/- 1m level assuming that SIRGAS 2000 is equivalent to WGS 84.

SIRGAS-Chile 2002 to ITRF2000 (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Time-specific Position Vector transform (geocen)
| Extent: Chile - onshore and offshore. Includes Easter Island, Juan Fernandez Islands, San Felix, and Sala y Gomez.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9177'

Transformation is exact at epoch 2002.00 but accuracy then decreasing with time.

SNN76 height to EVRF2000 height (1)
-----------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset and Slope
| Extent: Germany - states of former East Germany - Berlin, Brandenburg; Mecklenburg-Vorpommern; Sachsen; Sachsen-Anhalt; Thuringen.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5422'

SPCS83 Alabama East zone (US Survey feet)
-----------------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United States (USA) - Alabama east of approximately 86°37'W - counties Barbour; Bullock; Calhoun; Chambers; Cherokee; Clay; Cleburne; Coffee; Coosa; Covington; Crenshaw; Dale; De Kalb; Elmore; Etowah; Geneva; Henry; Houston; Jackson; Lee; Macon; Madison; Marshall; Montgomery; Pike; Randolph; Russell; StClair; Talladega; Tallapoosa.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9746'

This map projection is not formally recognised by the NGS because there is no State legislation for NAD83 defining the foot to be used. See code 10131 for official metric definition. ftUS required by AL DOT and used by other professional practioners.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15343'

State law defines grid unit as US Survey feet. For equivalent metric Federal definition see code 13132.

SRB_ETRS89 to ETRS89 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Serbia including Vojvodina.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8893'

SRB_ETRS89 is a national realization of ETRS89. May be taken as approximate transformation SRB_ETRS89 to WGS 84 - see code 8894.

-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Singapore - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8886'

Considered exact at 1994-01-01 when SVY21 aligned to WGS 84 (Transit).

SWEREF99 TM
-----------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Sweden - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17333'

Projection parameters are identical to UTM zone 33N. Unlike UTM zone 33N, the SWREF99 TM is used throughout all Sweden.

SWEREF99 to ETRS89 (1)
----------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Sweden - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1878'

Can be taken as an approximate transformation SWEREF99 to WGS 84 - see code 1879.

-------------------------------------------

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8270'

Replaces Saint Pierre et Miquelon 1950 to WGS 84 (1) (code 1923) from March 2006. Accuracy +/- 0.5 to 1 metre.

Schwarzeck to WGS 84 (2)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Namibia - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1271'

Beware!  Source CRS uses GLM, tfm param in m. Example: Schwarzeck φ=19°35'46.952"S λ=20°41'50.649"E h=1185.99m; X=5623409.386 Y=2124618.003 Z=-2125847.632 GLM; X=5623485.84m Y=2124646.89m Z=-2125876.54m; WGS 84 X=5624101.48m Y=2124748.97m Z=-2126132.35m.

Selangor Cassini Grid
---------------------
| Method: Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: Malaysia - West Malaysia - Selangor.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::4117'

Origin is Bukit Asa. Replaced by GDM2000 Selangor grid (code 19890).

Selangor Grid
-------------
| Method: Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: Malaysia - West Malaysia - Selangor.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19890'

Origin is station 251D at Felda Soeharto, K. Kuba Baharu. Offset from old grid origin is -13076.704m east, 503.095m north.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19892'

Shackleford
-----------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Texas.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::14252'

Replaced by TSMS. 

Care: survey data in Texas uses the US survey foot, not the International foot used by this projection.

Sierra Leone 1968 to WGS 84 (1)
-------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Sierra Leone - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1614'

Determined at 8 stations, accuracy +/- 15m in each axis. Info. Source has the source CRS as Sierra Leone 1960. Sierra Leone 1968 is a readjustment of the 1960 network: coordinates changed by less than 3 metres.

Sierra Leone New Colony Grid
----------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Sierra Leone - Freetown Peninsula.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19963'

Replaces the Sierra Leone Colony Grid. New grid is 422.3 ft west and 112.1 ft south of old grid.

South Africa Basic Survey Unit Albers 25E
-----------------------------------------
| Method: Albers Equal Area
| Extent: South Africa - mainland - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9219'

Came into use from 2019-01-01. Use is extended northwards into neighbouring countries to include the river catchment areas of the Orange/Gariep and Limpopo rivers.

South China Sea Lambert
-----------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: China - offshore South China Sea - Pearl River basin.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19863'

Originally defined with FN=500000 at true origin. This is at 21° 00' 37.0619"N. But operators assumed that it was at 21°N exactly. Thus by common practice Nf=500000 at 21°N exactly. The potential ambiguity is 1138m.

St. George Island to NAD83 (2)
------------------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (2D)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Alaska - Pribilof Islands - St George Island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8546'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; EPSG source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°.

St. Helena Local Grid 1971
--------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha - St Helena Island - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7875'


St. Helena Tritan to SHGD2015 (1)
---------------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha - St Helena Island - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7897'

Derived at 19 stations, RMS = 5cm. May be used as an approximate transformation to WGS 84 - see code 7898.

St. Lawrence Island to NAD83 (2)
--------------------------------
| Method: NADCON5 (2D)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Alaska - St Lawrence Island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8547'

Uses NADCON5 method which expects longitudes positive east in range 0-360°; EPSG source and target CRSs have longitudes positive east in range -180° to +180°.

| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: St Lucia - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6897'

Derived at 3 stations. Accuracy 1m in each axis.

Sud Algerie
-----------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: Algeria - 35 grads to 38.5 grads North (31°30'N to 34°39'N).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18022'

Use with Nord Sahara 1959 datum. INCT uses this projection to the southern limit of Algeria but due to distance from origin OGP does not endorse this practice and south of 31°30'N recommends use of UTM.

Sud Algerie (ancienne)
----------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: Algeria - 35 grads to 38.5 grads North (31°30'N to 34°39'N).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18012'

Used with Voirol 1875 datum - now replaced.

Sud Maroc
---------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
| Extent: Morocco onshore south of 35 grads North (31°30'N).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::18132'

A projection with the same parameter values used the Lambert Conic Near-Conformal method (EPSG code 9817) prior to 1953.

Survey of India Lambert
-----------------------

Sweden zone 0 gon
-----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Sweden - communes between approximately 16°55'E and 19°10'E; Gotland. See information source for map.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17336'

At the municipal level alternative projections are found defined with different sets of False Northing and Easting, based on 100 km grid squares. This is denoted by the last part of the name.  For example 61:-1 means FN = -6100000 and FE = 100000 m.

Sweden zone 2.5 gon O
---------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Sweden - communes between approximately 19°10'E and 21°25'E. See information source for map.

At the municipal level alternative projections are found defined with different sets of False Northing and Easting, based on 100 km grid squares. This is denoted by the last part of the name.  For example 61:-1 means FN = -6100000 and FE = 100000 m.

Swiss Oblique Mercator 1903C
----------------------------
| Method: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B)
| Extent: Liechtenstein; Switzerland.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19923'

In Switzerland, replaced by new grid LV03 (proj code 19922). Longitude is referenced to the Bern meridian. See proj code 19841 for Greenwich-based equivalent.

TGD2005 to WGS 84 (1)
---------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Tonga - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9771'

For many purposes TGD2005 can be considered to be coincident with WGS 84. This approximation ignores the low accuracy of the WGS 84 ensemble and the application of tectonic plate motion to WGS 84 data.

TM Emilia-Romagna
-----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Italy - Emilia-Romagna region.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5658'

When applied to Monte Mario datum, this projection emulates superseded CRS ED50 / UTMA in which FE=500000m and FN=-4000000m exactly. This projection's FE and FN values include approximations for the transformation from Monte Mario to ED50.

----------------------------

| Extent: Trinidad and Tobago - offshore west of 60°W.

----------------------------

| Extent: Trinidad and Tobago - offshore east of 60°W.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8034'
