TM35FIN
-------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Finland - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::16065'

Identical to UTM zone 35N (code 16035) except for area of use. TM35FIN is used in conjunction with ETRS89 for mapping all Finnish territory (from 19°E to 31.6°E) in a single zone.

TM75 to ETRS89 (1)
------------------
| Method: General polynomial of degree 6
| Extent: Ireland - onshore. United Kingdom (UK) - Northern Ireland (Ulster) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1041'

Derived at 183 points, accuracy 0.4m (95%). Use iteration for reverse transformation ETRS89 to TM75. Emulated by NTv2 method (code 6946) and used as approximate CT to WGS 84 (code 1042).

TM75 to ETRS89 (2)
------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Ireland - onshore. United Kingdom (UK) - Northern Ireland (Ulster) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1953'

TM75 is based on the geodetic datum of 1965 which should not be confused with the mapping adjustment of 1965 (TM65). May be taken as approximate transformations TM75 to WGS 84, TM65 to WGS 84 and OSNI 1952 to WGS 84 - see codes 1954, 1641 and 1955.

TPEN11-TM
---------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United Kingdom (UK) - on or related to the Trans-Pennine rail route from Liverpool via Manchester to Bradford and Leeds.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9366'

In conjunction with transformation ETRS89 to TPEN11-IRF (1) (code 9365), emulates the TPEN11 Snake and TPEN11ext Snake projections.

TUREF to ETRS89 (1)

| Extent: Turkey - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5260'

Note: the ETRS89 CRS is not used in Turkey.

Tete to Moznet (2)
------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Mozambique - Maputo province and southern part of Gaza province; i.e. south of approximately 24°S.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1298'

Mean of 9 stations. Residuals are generally under 1 metre. May be taken as approximate transformation Tete to WGS 84 - see code 1684.

Tete to Moznet (3)
------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)

Texas CS27 North Central zone
-----------------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Texas - counties of: Andrews; Archer; Bailey; Baylor; Borden; Bowie; Callahan; Camp; Cass; Clay; Cochran; Collin; Cooke; Cottle; Crosby; Dallas; Dawson; Delta; Denton; Dickens; Eastland; Ellis; Erath; Fannin; Fisher; Floyd; Foard; Franklin; Gaines; Garza; Grayson; Gregg; Hale; Hardeman; Harrison; Haskell; Henderson; Hill; Hockley; Hood; Hopkins; Howard; Hunt; Jack; Johnson; Jones; Kaufman; Kent; King; Knox; Lamar; Lamb; Lubbock; Lynn; Marion; Martin; Mitchell; Montague; Morris; Motley; Navarro; Nolan; Palo Pinto; Panola; Parker; Rains; Red River; Rockwall; Rusk; Scurry; Shackelford; Smith; Somervell; Stephens; Stonewall; Tarrant; Taylor; Terry; Throckmorton; Titus; Upshur; Van Zandt; Wichita; Wilbarger; Wise; Wood; Yoakum; Young.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::14202'

Texas CS27 South Central zone
-----------------------------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: United States (USA) - Texas - counties of Aransas; Atascosa; Austin; Bandera; Bee; Bexar; Brazoria; Brewster; Caldwell; Calhoun; Chambers; Colorado; Comal; De Witt; Dimmit; Edwards; Fayette; Fort Bend; Frio; Galveston; Goliad; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Harris; Hays; Jackson; Jefferson; Karnes; Kendall; Kerr; Kinney; La Salle; Lavaca; Live Oak; Matagorda; Maverick; McMullen; Medina; Presidio; Real; Refugio; Terrell; Uvalde; Val Verde; Victoria; Waller; Wharton; Wilson; Zavala. Gulf of Mexico outer continental shelf (GoM OCS) protraction areas: Matagorda Island; Brazos; Galveston; High Island, Sabine Pass (TX).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::14204'

Timaru 2000
-----------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Timaru meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17952'

Replaces Timaru Circuit (code 17922) after 1st March 2000.

Timaru Circuit
--------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - South Island - Timaru meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17922'

Replaced Imperial measure circuit in 1972. Replaced by Timaru 2000 (code 17952) from March 2000.

Timbalai 1948 to GDBD2009 (1)

| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Brunei Darussalam - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5878'

May be taken as approximate transformation Timbalai 1948 to WGS 84 - see code 5249.

Tokyo 1892 to Korean 1985 (1)
-----------------------------
| Method: Longitude rotation
| Extent: Republic of Korea (South Korea) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5134'

Caused by redetermination of longitude of Tokyo datum origin in 1918. Korean 1985 is based on the 1918 determination.

Tokyo 1892 to Tokyo (1)
-----------------------
| Method: Longitude rotation
| Extent: Japan - onshore; North Korea - onshore; South Korea - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5133'

Caused by redetermination of longitude of Tokyo datum fundamental point in 1918.

Tokyo to JGD2000 (1)
--------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Japan including outlying islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15483'

Derived at Tokyo datum origin. Accuracy on main islands 9m. Also used on remote islands with significantly less accuracy: Io-To 793m, Kitadaito and Minamidaito Jima 642m, Tarama and Minna Shima 560m, Ishigaki and Taketomi Jima 251m, Yonaguni Jima 248m.

Tokyo to JGD2000 (2)
--------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Japan including outlying islands - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6712'

NTv2 grid derived by ESRI from that supplied by GSI in application tky2jgd. After Tohoku earthquake of 2011 accuracy in northern Honshu reduced to 1-5m and in this area replaced by Tokyo to JGD2011 (tfm code 6714).

Tokyo to JGD2011 (2)
--------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Japan - onshore, excluding northern prefectures of 'main province' (see remarks).

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6740'

Parameter values from Tokyo to JGD2000 (2) (tfm code 6712) as  in area of applicability JGD2011 = JGD2000. NTv2 grid derived by ESRI from that supplied by GSI in application tky2jgd. See Tokyo to JGD2011 (1) (tfm code 6714) for northern Honshu area.

Tokyo to WGS 84 (2)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Japan - onshore mainland and adjacent islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1231'

Derived at 16 stations. Accuracy 8m, 5m and 8m in X, Y and Z axes.

Tokyo to WGS 84 (4)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Japan - onshore Okinawa.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1233'

Derived at 3 stations. Accuracy 20m, 5m and 20m in X, Y and Z axes.

Tokyo to WGS 84 (5)
-------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Republic of Korea (South Korea) - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1305'

Derived at 29 stations. Accuracy 2m in each axis. Replaces Tokyo to WGS 84 (3) (code 1232).

Trinidad Grid

| Extent: Trinidad and Tobago - Trinidad - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19925'


Trinidad Grid (Clarke's feet)
-----------------------------
| Method: Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: Trinidad and Tobago - Trinidad - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19975'

Foot version of EPSG code 19925. Not an official system, but used by some US-based organisations including Amoco Trinidad.

Tristan 1968 to WGS 84 (1)
--------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha - Tristan da Cunha island group including Tristan, Inaccessible, Nightingale, Middle and Stoltenhoff Islands.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15816'

Determined at 1 satellite station. Accuracy +/- 25m in each axis.

Tuhirangi 2000
--------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - North Island - Tuhirangi meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17936'

Replaces Tuhirangi Circuit (code 17906) after 1st March 2000.

Tuhirangi Circuit
-----------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: New Zealand - North Island - Tuhirangi meridional circuit area.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17906'

Replaced Imperial measure circuit in 1972. Replaced by Tuhirangi 2000 (code 17936) from March 2000.

Tunisia Mining Grid
-------------------
| Method: Tunisia Mining Grid
| Extent: Tunisia - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19937'

The origin of the grid is at 38.81973gN, 7.83445gE of Paris, near Djebel Kebar, at which the grid reference is 270582.

UCS-2000 to ITRF2000 (1)
------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geocentric domain)
| Extent: Ukraine - onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7817'

Derived for epoch 2005.0 at which time it defines UCS-2000 and is therefore exact (accuracy = 0) at this epoch. May be taken as approximate transformation UCS-2000 to ETRS89 and UCS-2000 to WGS 84 - see codes 9901 and 5840.

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17294'

UTM grid system (northern hemisphere)
-------------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator Zoned Grid System
| Extent: Northern hemisphere between equator and 84°N, onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::16000'

Use UTM zone xx N (codes 16001-16060) for use outwith zone boundary or when easting is not prefixed by zone number.

UTM grid system (southern hemisphere)
-------------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator Zoned Grid System
| Extent: Southern hemisphere between equator and 80°S, onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::16100'

Use UTM zone xx S (codes 16101-16160) for use outwith zone boundary or when easting is not prefixed by zone number.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15878'

Parameter values taken from Viti Levu 1912 to WGS 84 (1) (tfm code 15897). Approximation at the +/- 50m level assuming that CRS 4748 is equivalent to CRS 4752 within the transformation accuracy. Source CRSs 4748 and 4752 are independent but connected.

Vanua Levu Grid
---------------
| Method: Hyperbolic Cassini-Soldner
| Extent: Fiji - Vanua Levu and Taveuni.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::19878'

Original definition is in chains (1 chain = 100 links).

Vermont CS27
------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United States (USA) - Vermont - counties of Addison; Bennington; Caledonia; Chittenden; Essex; Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Rutland; Washington; Windham; Windsor.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::14400'


Vertical Axis Unit Conversion
-----------------------------
| Method: Change of Vertical Unit
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7813'

Source and target CRSs both must have the same axis direction (both up or both down).

Vicgrid
-------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Australia - Victoria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17361'

May also be used to display Victoria, New South Wales, Tasmania and South Australia as a single entity. Replaces Vicgrid66 with effect from 2nd February 2000.

Vicgrid66
---------
| Method: Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP)
| Extent: Australia - Victoria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::17360'

May also be used to display Victoria, New South Wales, Tasmania and South Australia as a single entity. Replaced by Vicgrid94 with effect from 2nd February 2000. Prior to 2000 this projection was known as VICGRID.

Vienna height to GHA height (1)
-------------------------------
| Method: Vertical Offset
| Extent: Austria - Vienna city state.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9371'

Defines Wiener Null surface. GHA vertical reference surface is 156.68m below Wiener Null surface.

| Extent: Laos.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::1063'

Derived at 8 stations.

Viti Levu 1912 to WGS 84 (2)
----------------------------
| Method: Geocentric translations (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Fiji - Viti Levu island.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::6895'

Derived at 9 stations. Accuracy +/-3m in each axis. Replaces Viti Levu 1912 to WGS 84 (1) (code 15897).

WEIPA94
-------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: Australia - Queensland - Weipa area between 141°30'E and 142°30'E.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::8389'

Grid convergence uses opposite sign convention to UTM. The projection has reduced scale distortion compared to Map Grid of Australia zone 54 (code 17354).

WGS 84 (G1150) to WGS 84 (G1674) (1)
------------------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9963'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Derived via ITRF2005. May be approximated to 0.4m using 7-parameter CF method 1032 with parameters for epoch 2007.50 of tX=-2.65mm tY=1.35mm tZ=27.7mm rX=-0.27mas rY=027mas rZ=-0.38 mas dS=1.88ppb.

Defined at epoch 2001.0. Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m.

WGS 84 (G730) to WGS 84 (G873) (1)
----------------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geocentric domain)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9961'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Derived via ITRF91 through ITRF94 at epoch 1995.5. Parameter values valid at other epochs including 2005.0.

WGS 84 (G873) to ITRF94 (1)
---------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geocentric domain)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9076'

Defined at epoch 1997.0.

WGS 84 (G873) to WGS 84 (G1150) (1)
-----------------------------------
| Method: Time-dependent Coordinate Frame rotation (geocen)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9962'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Derived via ITRF94 through ITRF2000. May be approximated to 0.2m using 7-parameter CF method 1032 with parameters for epoch 1999.50 of tX=1.1mm tY=-8.0mm tZ=14.3mm rX=0 rY=0 rZ=0.05mas dS=1.505ppb.

WGS 84 (Transit) to WGS 84 (G730) (1)
-------------------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geocentric domain)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9960'

Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9 or nm/m. Derived through ITRF90 and ITRF91 at epoch 1990.5. Parameter values valid at other epochs including 2005.0.

WGS 84 to ETRS89 (2)
--------------------
| Method: Time-specific Position Vector transform (geocen)
| Extent: Germany - offshore North Sea. Netherlands - offshore east of 5E.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9225'

Parameter values derived from ITRF2008 to ETRF2000 (1), code 7951, as a time-specific transformation @2014.81, assuming ITRF2008 = WGS 84 (G1762) = WGS 84 and ETRF2000 = ETRS89.

WGS 84 to GDA2020 (3)
---------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Australia including Lord Howe Island, Macquarie Island, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Norfolk Island. All onshore and offshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9690'

Concatenation of CTs 1150 and 8048 through GDA94. Scale difference in ppb where 1/billion = 1E-9. See WGS 84 to GDA2020 (4) (CT code 9691) for alternative for Australia including distortion model.

WGS 84 to GDA2020 (4)
---------------------
| Method: NTv2
| Extent: Australia - Australian Capital Territory; New South Wales; Northern Territory; Queensland; South Australia; Tasmania; Western Australia; Victoria.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9691'

Equivalent to concatenation of null CT 1150 and CT 8447 through GDA94. See WGS 84 to GDA94 (3) (CT code 9690) for conformal-only alternative (i.e. without distortion modelling).

WGS 84 to IG05/12 Intermediate CRS
----------------------------------
| Method: Coordinate Frame rotation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Israel - onshore; Palestine Territory - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::9189'

Parameter values from CT code 9186 assuming that WGS 84 is coincident with ITRF2008. Updates CT 6993 for approx 40cm tectonic plate motion for GIS purposes. CT 6993 remains the legal definition of IG05/12 and must be used for cadastre and engineering.

WISCRS Adams and Juneau Counties (ftUS)
---------------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United States (USA) - Wisconsin - counties of Adams and Juneau.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7485'

See proj code 7484 for authoritative metric definition. Replaces and emulates WCCS zone. Defined by Wisconsin DOT as two separate zones (one for each county) each having identical projection parameter values: see info source.

WISCRS Adams and Juneau Counties (m)
------------------------------------
| Method: Transverse Mercator
| Extent: United States (USA) - Wisconsin - counties of Adams and Juneau.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::7484'

Replaces and emulates WCCS zone. For equivalent non-metric definition see proj code 7485. Defined by Wisconsin DOT as two separate zones (one for each county) each having identical projection parameter values: see info source.

Yacare to SIRGAS-ROU98 (1)
--------------------------
| Method: Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)
| Extent: Uruguay - onshore.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::5385'

Derived at 11 stations during 1998 densification of Uruguay control based on SIRGAS 1995. Accuracy at stations used for derivation: 0.13 to 1.17m.

Axis order change (2D)
----------------------
| Method: Axis Order Reversal (2D)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15498'

This conversion allows the creation of a user-defined geographic 2D CRS with axis order longitude, latitude from an EPSG geographic 2D CRS.

Axis order change (geographic3D horizontal)
-------------------------------------------
| Method: Axis Order Reversal (Geographic3D horizontal)
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15499'

This conversion allows the creation of a user-defined geographic 3D CRS with axis order longitude, latitude, ellipsoid height from an EPSG geographic 3D CRS.

Geocentric to geographic3D
--------------------------
| Method: Geographic/geocentric conversions
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15592'


Geographic3D to geographic2D
----------------------------
| Method: Geographic3D to 2D conversion
| Extent: World.

.. code-block:: php

    'urn:ogc:def:coordinateOperation:EPSG::15593'

See EPSG Guidance Note #7 or Coordinate Operation Method description for techniques for handling reverse conversion.
